trans-unit.resname: AboutDialog['{[=-lt;-=]}html{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}head/{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}body{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}PCSX2 is a free and open-source PlayStation 2 (PS2) emulator. Its purpose is to emulate the PS2{[=-apos;-=]}s hardware, using a combination of MIPS CPU Interpreters, Recompilers and a Virtual Machine which manages hardware states and PS2 system memory. This allows you to play PS2 games on your PC, with many additional features and benefits.{[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}/body{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-
trans-unit.source: <html><head/><body><p>PCSX2 is a free and open-source PlayStation 2 (PS2) emulator. Its purpose is to emulate the PS2's hardware, using a combination of MIPS CPU Interpreters, Recompilers and a Virtual Machine which manages hardware states and PS2 system memory. This allows you to play PS2 games on your PC, with many additional features and benefits.</p></body></html>
trans-unit.target: <html><head/><body><p>PCSX2 är an fri emulator för PlayStation 2 (PS2) med öppen källkod. Dess syfte är att emulera PS2:s hårdvara genom att använda en kombination av MIPS-processortolkar, omkompilatorer, och en virtuell maskin som hanterar hårdvarutillstånd och PS2-systemminne. Detta tillåter dig att spela PS2-spel på din PC, med många ytterligare funktioner och fördelar.</p></body></html>

@drago2126 Achievements can not be unlocked without tracking. An user can log into the RetroAchievements system, but if the achievement tracking system is off, achievements will not be tracked and unlocked when needed.

trans-unit.source: <html><head/><body><p align="justify">PCSX2 uses RetroAchievements as an achievement database and for tracking progress. To use achievements, please sign up for an account at <a href="https://retroachievements.org/">retroachievements.org</a>.</p><p align="justify">To view the achievement list in-game, press the hotkey for <span style=" font-weight:600;">Open Pause Menu</span> and select <span style=" font-weight:600;">Achievements</span> from the menu.</p></body></html>
trans-unit.target: <html><head/><body><p align="justify">PCSX2 använder RetroAchievements som en prestationsdatabas och för att spåra framsteg. För att använda prestationer, registrera ett konto på <a href="https://retroachievements.org/">retroachievements.org</a>.</p><p align="justify">För att se prestationslistan när du spelar, tryck på snabbtangenten för <span style=" font-weight:600;">Öppna Pausmenyn</span> och välj <span style=" font-weight:600;">Prestationer</span> från menyn.</p></body></html>

trans-unit.resname: AdvancedSettingsWidget['Changes how PCSX2 handles rounding while emulating the Emotion Engine{[=-apos;-=]}s Floating Point Unit (EE FPU). Because the various FPUs in the PS2 are non-compliant with international standards, some games may need different modes to do math correctly. The default value handles the vast majority of games; {[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}modifying this setting when a game is not having a visible problem can cause instability.{[=-lt;-=]}/b{[=-gt;-=]}']
trans-unit.source: Changes how PCSX2 handles rounding while emulating the Emotion Engine's Floating Point Unit (EE FPU). Because the various FPUs in the PS2 are non-compliant with international standards, some games may need different modes to do math correctly. The default value handles the vast majority of games; <b>modifying this setting when a game is not having a visible problem can cause instability.</b>
trans-unit.target: Ändrar hur PCSX2 hanterar avrundning vid emulering av Emotion Engines Flyttalsprocessor (EE FPU). Eftersom de olika FPU:erna i PS2 inte uppfyller internationella standarder, kan vissa spel behöva olika lägen för att utföra matematiska beräkningar korrekt. Standardvärdet hanterar majoriteten av spel; <b>att ändra denna inställning när ett spel inte har ett synligt problem kan orsaka instabilitet.</b>
trans-unit.note: I dont know if it is required to translate the FPU. If so, it would be something like 'Jedinica sa pomičnim zarezom.'.
Tried my best here, hopefully someone who knows how the technical stuff comes here and refines my translation.

trans-unit.resname: AdvancedSettingsWidget['Determines how the results of floating-point division are rounded. Some games need specific settings; {[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}modifying this setting when a game is not having a visible problem can cause instability.{[=-lt;-=]}/b{[=-gt;-=]}']
trans-unit.source: Determines how the results of floating-point division are rounded. Some games need specific settings; <b>modifying this setting when a game is not having a visible problem can cause instability.</b>
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer hur resultaten från flyttalsdivision rundas. Vissa spel behöver specifika inställningar; <b>att ändra den här inställningen när ett spel inte har ett synligt problem kan orsaka instabilitet.<b>

trans-unit.note:
Can be understood as a limiting mode to certain range, a very big number (close to what people refer as infinites) might just be as referred to Maximum value of the PS2. Or a Min/max that needs to fit. Many languages don't understand what clamping is, you can also vaguely think of as a double roundings mode but instead of making 4.4 to 4 and 5.6 to 6. It will be closer to seeing any value lower than 100 will become 100 and any values higher than 1000 will become 1000 as an example tl;dr Min/Max range and outside it will be forced to fit in that range
Maybe the original meaning came from using 2 cloth clamps on a wire

context-group.context: Wait loop: When the game makes the CPU do nothing (loop/spin) while it waits for something to happen (usually an interrupt). AdvancedSettingsWidget ../Settings/AdvancedSettingsWidget.cpp:89

trans-unit.note: "Wait Loop" needs a definition by someone knowledgeable in programming.
@IlDucci im pretty proficient in programming, hope this helps :)
@techg9 Thank you for replying! The comment is old, as the PCSX2 team was able to give us a description (in English, for every language) and add it to the CONTEXT section. Happy translating!

Wait loop detection is a technique used in games to improve performance. It checks if the game's code is stuck in a loop or spinning without doing anything while waiting for something to happen. By detecting and interrupting these loops, the game can free up the CPU's resources, resulting in better performance and smoother gameplay without noticeable slowdowns. It's like preventing the game from wasting time and making the CPU more efficient.
So basically a CPU can go crazy like some ADHD person waiting to receive something and get stuck but it could be doing more interesting stuff, similary like spin CPU and spin GPU where it is a similar situation but there you feed it with bits of useless information to not go to sleep which in that situation would reduce it's clock (and perhaps wattage) and reduce FPS
See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Busy_waiting for reference, the article is translated to 21 languages.

trans-unit.resname: AdvancedSettingsWidget['Moderate speedup for some games, with no known side effects.']
trans-unit.source: Moderate speedup for some games, with no known side effects.
trans-unit.target: Måttlig hastighetsökning för vissa spel, utan kända biverkningar.

trans-unit.note: This refers to the recommended value for each option, seen in the hint box after the text "Recommended Value:". Need to confirm if it is used elsewhere, as the uppercasing/lowercasing could change between languages if it doesn't always go after a colon.

context-group.context: INTC = Name of a PS2 register, leave as-is. "spin" = to make a cpu (or gpu) actively do nothing while you wait for something. Like spinning in a circle, you're moving but not actually going anywhere. AdvancedSettingsWidget ../Settings/AdvancedSettingsWidget.cpp:95

trans-unit.note: INTC = Name of a PS2 register, leave as-is. "spin" = needs a definition by someone knowledgeable in programming.
@IlDucci I used "use" for "spin". not knowledgeable in the field though.
Spinning isn't much different when in a loop of repetitive instructions with no meaningful outcome, I think it's a form of Wait Loop Detection

trans-unit.resname: AdvancedSettingsWidget['Pauses the virtual machine when a TLB miss occurs, instead of ignoring it and continuing. Note that the VM will pause after the end of the block, not on the instruction which caused the exception. Refer to the console to see the address where the invalid access occurred.']
trans-unit.source: Pauses the virtual machine when a TLB miss occurs, instead of ignoring it and continuing. Note that the VM will pause after the end of the block, not on the instruction which caused the exception. Refer to the console to see the address where the invalid access occurred.
trans-unit.target: Pausar den virtuella maskinen när en TLB-miss inträffar, istället för att ignorera den och fortsätta. Observera att VM:en kommer att pausa efter slutet av blocket, inte på instruktionen som orsakade undantaget. Kolla i konsolen för att se adressen där den ogiltiga åtkomsten inträffade.

A form of IPC which stands for Inter-Process Communication. It refers to the mechanisms and techniques used by different processes or programs running on a computer to communicate and share data with each other. IPC allows processes to exchange information, synchronize their activities, and coordinate their actions.
IPC stands for Inter-Process Communication. It refers to the mechanisms and techniques used by different processes or programs running on a computer to communicate and share data with each other. IPC allows processes to exchange information, synchronize their activities, and coordinate their actions.
There are various methods of IPC, including:
Shared Memory: Processes can access the same region of memory, enabling them to share data by reading from and writing to that shared memory location.
Message Passing: Processes send and receive messages to communicate with each other. Messages can contain data, instructions, or requests for action.
Pipes and FIFOs: These are channels that connect the output of one process to the input of another process, allowing them to communicate by sending data through the pipe.
Sockets: Processes can communicate over a network using network sockets, which provide a bidirectional communication channel between two endpoints.
Signals: Processes can send signals to each other to notify events, handle interrupts, or communicate specific conditions.
Where-as Pine is focusing on Sockets aspect primarily
You might have just said that PINE means Protocol for Instrumentation of Emulators as well.

What kind of "slot" is this? I assume it's a network-type slot, but I'd like to have a confirmation.
EDIT: Reply by Govanify: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1123611486623891556/1153271447410724925/Capture_decran_2023-09-18_a_12.08.51.png
This is a networking-type slot, not to be confused with a computer hardware slot.

trans-unit.note: sounds kind of odd in original? how sound can be represented in frames, while its likely samples that seems more correct

The original does sound a bit off but it just means that it attaches the speed to the game, so if it goes lower than normal it will produce slow motion audio instead of skipping, and if it goes faster than normal it goes with spedup audio.
Similar concept to using cheat engine speed hack where it slows down or speeds up everything from your perspective.
Probably needs some revisioning

@nikivarvar Just like with video, audio is also pumped in frames. Samples from all channels at a given sampling point are grouped together to form an audio frame.
E.g. if you have a stereo signal, then at any given point in time you'll have a left channel sample and a right channel sample active. The two samples together you call an audio frame.

Reference: https://manual.yamaha.com/av/18/rxa780/en-US/3627522571.html

trans-unit.resname: AudioStretchSettingsDialog['{[=-lt;-=]}html{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}head/{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}body{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}span style={[=-quot;-=]} font-weight:700;{[=-quot;-=]}{[=-gt;-=]}Audio Stretch Settings{[=-lt;-=]}/span{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}br/{[=-gt;-=]}These settings fine-tune the behavior of the SoundTouch audio time stretcher when running outside of 100% speed.{[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}/body{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}/html{[=-gt;-=]}']
trans-unit.source: <html><head/><body><p><span style=" font-weight:700;">Audio Stretch Settings</span><br/>These settings fine-tune the behavior of the SoundTouch audio time stretcher when running outside of 100% speed.</p></body></html>
trans-unit.target: <html><head/><body><p><span style=" font-weight:700;">Ljudsträckningsinställningar</span><br/>Dessa inställningar finjusterar beteendet hos SoundTouch ljudtidssträckare när den körs utöver 100% hastighet.</p></body></html>

trans-unit.note:
From the SoundTouch manual:
General optimizations:
The time-stretch routine has a 'quick' mode that substantially speeds up the algorithm but may slightly compromise the sound quality. This mode is activated by calling SoundTouch::setSetting() function with parameter id of SETTING_USE_QUICKSEEK and value "1", i.e.
setSetting(SETTING_USE_QUICKSEEK, 1);

trans-unit.resname: AutoUpdaterDialog['{[=-lt;-=]}h2{[=-gt;-=]}Save State Warning{[=-lt;-=]}/h2{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}Installing this update will make your save states {[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}incompatible{[=-lt;-=]}/b{[=-gt;-=]}. Please ensure you have saved your games to a Memory Card before installing this update or you will lose progress.{[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}']
trans-unit.source: <h2>Save State Warning</h2><p>Installing this update will make your save states <b>incompatible</b>. Please ensure you have saved your games to a Memory Card before installing this update or you will lose progress.</p>
trans-unit.target: <h2>Snabbsparningsvarning</h2><p>Att installera den här uppdateringen kommer göra dina snabbsparningar <b>inkompatibla</b>. Se till att du har sparat dina spel till ett minneskort innan du installerar uppdateringen för att inte förlora dina framsteg.</p>

trans-unit.resname: AutoUpdaterDialog['{[=-lt;-=]}h2{[=-gt;-=]}Settings Warning{[=-lt;-=]}/h2{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}Installing this update will reset your program configuration. Please note that you will have to reconfigure your settings after this update.{[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}']
trans-unit.source: <h2>Settings Warning</h2><p>Installing this update will reset your program configuration. Please note that you will have to reconfigure your settings after this update.</p>
trans-unit.target: <h2>Varning för inställningar</h2><p>Installation av denna uppdatering kommer att nollställa din programkonfiguration. Observera att du måste konfigurera om dina inställningar efter denna uppdatering.</p>

trans-unit.resname: AutoUpdaterDialog['{[=-lt;-=]}h1{[=-gt;-=]}WARNING{[=-lt;-=]}/h1{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p style={[=-apos;-=]}font-size:12pt;{[=-apos;-=]}{[=-gt;-=]}Installing this update will make your {[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}save states incompatible{[=-lt;-=]}/b{[=-gt;-=]}, {[=-lt;-=]}i{[=-gt;-=]}be sure to save any progress to your memory cards before proceeding{[=-lt;-=]}/i{[=-gt;-=]}.{[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}Do you wish to continue?{[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}']
trans-unit.source: <h1>WARNING</h1><p style='font-size:12pt;'>Installing this update will make your <b>save states incompatible</b>, <i>be sure to save any progress to your memory cards before proceeding</i>.</p><p>Do you wish to continue?</p>
trans-unit.target: <h1>VARNING</h1><p style='font-size:12pt;'>Att installera den här uppdateringen kommer att göra dina <b>snabbsparningar inkompatibla</b>. <i>Se till att spara eventuella framsteg till minneskortet innan du går vidare</i>.</p><p>Vill du fortsätta?</p>

Patches the BIOS to skip the console's boot animation.
Removes emulation speed throttle until the game starts to reduce startup time.

trans-unit.note: If possible, try to find and use the official translation from Sony for this input.

I personally recommend looking up the DualSense manual, they're available as PDFs and should be translated to a lot of languages. Only in that manual was this specific phrase translated for Hungarian for example.
One thing to note, the English version of the manual calls them "Action buttons", so we're not actually using the Sony term in English either...

In the DUALSHOCK 2 (SCPH-10010) Japanese instruction manual, it is written as "△, ○, ✕, □ buttons". However, in the DualSense (CFI-ZCT1J) Japanese instruction manual, it is written as "Action buttons".
The greek manual of the DualShock 2 doesn't have a name for the buttons as a category. I'm gonna use the DualSense one that actually makes perfect sense instead.

Note to translators: the JogCon is a controller that was only released in Japan and the United States. Japanese should use the official designations from Namco/Sony, other languages can translate this as they see fit. This piece is an actual rotary dial used to turn left or right.
@IlDucci Thanks for the clarification, I thought was this was a rotary wheel standing on the left side or a rotary wheel that need to be turned left! But it means "Turn that dial to left"!

Note to translators: the JogCon is a controller that was only released in Japan and the United States. Japanese should use the official designations from Namco/Sony, other languages can translate this as they see fit. This piece is an actual rotary dial used to turn left or right.

Terminology warning for European languages: the "Twist" action on a neGcon has translations hidden in PS1 and PS2 manuals. However, the few cases I was able to find had inconsistency issues. If someone has enough Namco/Sony PS1/PS2 manuals from games with neGcon support, please take a look at those to figure out if there's a consisten terminology for French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch or Greek (or any other missing language).

trans-unit.resname: ControllerGlobalSettingsWidget['The SDL input source supports most controllers, and provides advanced functionality for DualShock 4 / DualSense pads in Bluetooth mode (Vibration / LED Control).']
trans-unit.source: The SDL input source supports most controllers, and provides advanced functionality for DualShock 4 / DualSense pads in Bluetooth mode (Vibration / LED Control).
trans-unit.target: SDL-inmatningskällan stöder de flesta kontrollerna, och ger avancerade funktioner åt DualShock 4 / DualSense-kontroller i Bluetooth-läge (Vibration / LED-kontroll).

trans-unit.note: Considero que "Fuente" es una mejor traducción.

trans-unit.resname: ControllerGlobalSettingsWidget['The DInput source provides support for legacy controllers which do not support XInput. Accessing these controllers via SDL instead is recommended, but DirectInput can be used if they are not compatible with SDL.']
trans-unit.source: The DInput source provides support for legacy controllers which do not support XInput. Accessing these controllers via SDL instead is recommended, but DirectInput can be used if they are not compatible with SDL.
trans-unit.target: DInput-källan ger stöd för äldre kontroller som inte stöder XInput. Att komma åt dessa kontroller via SDL rekommenderas istället, men DirectInput kan användas om de inte är kompatibla med SDL.

trans-unit.note: This string appears as the header for a subsection in the Global Settings tab of the Controller settings, but only when using a custom profile. Create an input profile to make it show.
I localized this as "profile-specific settings", to make the semantics clearer. Might be advisable in other languages too.

trans-unit.resname: ControllerGlobalSettingsWidget['When this option is enabled, hotkeys can be set in this input profile, and will be used instead of the global hotkeys. By default, hotkeys are always shared between all profiles.']
trans-unit.source: When this option is enabled, hotkeys can be set in this input profile, and will be used instead of the global hotkeys. By default, hotkeys are always shared between all profiles.
trans-unit.target: När det här alternativet är aktiverat kan snabbtangenter ställas in i den här inmatningsprofilen, och kommer att användas istället för de globala snabbtangenterna. Som standard delas snabbtangenter alltid mellan alla profiler.

trans-unit.resname: ControllerGlobalSettingsWidget['The XInput source provides support for Xbox 360 / Xbox One / Xbox Series controllers, and third party controllers which implement the XInput protocol.']
trans-unit.source: The XInput source provides support for Xbox 360 / Xbox One / Xbox Series controllers, and third party controllers which implement the XInput protocol.
trans-unit.target: XInput-källan ger stöd för Xbox 360-/Xbox One-/Xbox Series-kontroller, och tredjepartskontroller som använder XInput protokollet.

trans-unit.resname: ControllerGlobalSettingsWidget['The multitap enables up to 8 controllers to be connected to the console. Each multitap provides 4 ports. Multitap is not supported by all games.']
trans-unit.source: The multitap enables up to 8 controllers to be connected to the console. Each multitap provides 4 ports. Multitap is not supported by all games.
trans-unit.target: Multitap gör det möjligt att ansluta upp till 8 kontroller till konsolen. Varje multitap har 4 portar. Multitap stöds inte av alla spel.

trans-unit.note: Is it "console port" or "controller port"?
Is it "console port" or "controller port"?

trans-unit.resname: ControllerGlobalSettingsWidget['PCSX2 allows you to use your mouse to simulate analog stick movement.']
trans-unit.source: PCSX2 allows you to use your mouse to simulate analog stick movement.

trans-unit.resname: ControllerMappingSettingsDialog['{[=-lt;-=]}html{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}head/{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}body{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}span style={[=-quot;-=]} font-weight:700;{[=-quot;-=]}{[=-gt;-=]}Controller Mapping Settings{[=-lt;-=]}/span{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}br/{[=-gt;-=]}These settings fine-tune the behavior when mapping physical controllers to the emulated controllers.{[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}/body{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}/html{[=-gt;-=]}']
trans-unit.source: <html><head/><body><p><span style=" font-weight:700;">Controller Mapping Settings</span><br/>These settings fine-tune the behavior when mapping physical controllers to the emulated controllers.</p></body></html>
trans-unit.target: <html><head/><body><p><span style=" font-weight:700;">Inställningar för handkontrollermappning</span><br/>Dessa inställningar finjusterar beteenden vid mappning av fysiska kontroller till de emulerade kontrollerna.</p></body></html>

trans-unit.resname: ControllerMappingSettingsDialog['{[=-lt;-=]}html{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}head/{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}body{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}Some third party controllers incorrectly flag their analog sticks as inverted on the positive component, but not negative.{[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}As a result, the analog stick will be {[=-amp;quot;-=]}stuck on{[=-amp;quot;-=]} even while resting at neutral position. {[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}Enabling this setting will tell PCSX2 to
trans-unit.source: <html><head/><body><p>Some third party controllers incorrectly flag their analog sticks as inverted on the positive component, but not negative.</p><p>As a result, the analog stick will be &quot;stuck on&quot; even while resting at neutral position. </p><p>Enabling this setting will tell PCSX2 to ignore inversion flags when creating mappings, allowing such controllers to function normally.</p></body></html>
trans-unit.target: <html><head/><body><p>En del tredjepartskontroller flaggar felaktigt sina analoga styrspakar som inverterade på den positiva komponenten, men inte den negativa.</p><p>Som följd av detta kommer de analoga styrspakarna bli &quot;fastna på&quot; även när de vilar i neutral position. </p><p>Att aktivera denna inställning säger åt PCSX2 att ignorera inverteringsflaggningar när mappningar skapas, så att sådana kontroller kommer fungera normalt.</p></body></html>

trans-unit.resname: ControllerMouseSettingsDialog['{[=-lt;-=]}html{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}head/{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}body{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}span style={[=-quot;-=]} font-weight:700;{[=-quot;-=]}{[=-gt;-=]}Mouse Mapping Settings{[=-lt;-=]}/span{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}br/{[=-gt;-=]}These settings fine-tune the behavior when mapping a mouse to the emulated controller.{[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}/body{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}/html{[=-gt;-=]}']
trans-unit.source: <html><head/><body><p><span style=" font-weight:700;">Mouse Mapping Settings</span><br/>These settings fine-tune the behavior when mapping a mouse to the emulated controller.</p></body></html>
trans-unit.target: <html><head/><body><p><span style=" font-weight:700;">Inställningar för musmappning</span><br/>Dessa inställningar finjusterar beteendet vid mappning av musen till den emulerade kontrollen.</p></body></html>

trans-unit.resname:
ControllerSettingsWindow['Custom input profiles are used to override the Shared input profile for specific games. To apply a custom input profile to a game, go to its Game Properties, then change the {[=-apos;-=]}Input Profile{[=-apos;-=]} on the Summary tab.
Enter the name for the new input profile:']
trans-unit.source:
Custom input profiles are used to override the Shared input profile for specific games. To apply a custom input profile to a game, go to its Game Properties, then change the 'Input Profile' on the Summary tab.
Enter the name for the new input profile:
trans-unit.target:
Anpassade inmatningsprofiler används för att åsidosätta den Delade inmatningsprofilen för enskilda spel. För att använda en inmatningsprofil för ett spel, gå till dess Spelegenskaper och ändra 'Inmatningsprofil' under fliken Sammanfattning.
Ange namnet för den nya inmatningsprofilen:

trans-unit.resname: ControllerSettingsWindow['A profile with the name {[=-apos;-=]}%1{[=-apos;-=]} already exists.']
trans-unit.source: A profile with the name '%1' already exists.
trans-unit.target: En profil med namnet '%1' finns redan.

trans-unit.resname: ControllerSettingsWindow['Do you want to copy all bindings from the currently-selected profile to the new profile? Selecting No will create a completely empty profile.']
trans-unit.source: Do you want to copy all bindings from the currently-selected profile to the new profile? Selecting No will create a completely empty profile.
trans-unit.target: Vill du kopiera alla bindningar från den aktuella profilen till den nya profilen? Att välja Nej kommer att skapa en helt tom profil.

trans-unit.resname: ControllerSettingsWindow['Do you want to copy the current hotkey bindings from global settings to the new input profile?']
trans-unit.source: Do you want to copy the current hotkey bindings from global settings to the new input profile?
trans-unit.target: Vill du kopiera nuvarande snabbtangentsbindningar från globala inställningar till den nya inmatningsprofilen?

trans-unit.resname: ControllerSettingsWindow['Failed to save the new profile to {[=-apos;-=]}%1{[=-apos;-=]}.']
trans-unit.source: Failed to save the new profile to '%1'.
trans-unit.target: Misslyckades med att spara nya profilen till '%1'.

trans-unit.resname:
ControllerSettingsWindow['Are you sure you want to load the input profile named {[=-apos;-=]}%1{[=-apos;-=]}?
All current global bindings will be removed, and the profile bindings loaded.
You cannot undo this action.']
trans-unit.source:
Are you sure you want to load the input profile named '%1'?
All current global bindings will be removed, and the profile bindings loaded.
You cannot undo this action.
trans-unit.target:
Är du säker på att du vill läsa in inmatningsprofilen '%1'?
Alla nuvarande globala bindningar kommer att tas bort, och profilbindningarna kommer läsas in.
Du kan inte ångra denna åtgärd.

trans-unit.resname: ControllerSettingsWindow['Enter the new name for the input profile:']
trans-unit.source: Enter the new name for the input profile:

trans-unit.target: Misslyckades med att byta namn på "%1".

ControllerSettingsWindow['Are you sure you want to delete the input profile named {[=-apos;-=]}%1{[=-apos;-=]}?
You cannot undo this action.']
trans-unit.source:
Are you sure you want to delete the input profile named '%1'?
You cannot undo this action.
trans-unit.target:
Är du säker på att du vill ta bort inmatningsprofilen '%1'?
Du kan inte ångra åtgärden.

trans-unit.resname:
ControllerSettingsWindow['Are you sure you want to restore the default controller configuration?
All shared bindings and configuration will be lost, but your input profiles will remain.
You cannot undo this action.']
trans-unit.source:
Are you sure you want to restore the default controller configuration?
All shared bindings and configuration will be lost, but your input profiles will remain.
You cannot undo this action.
trans-unit.target:
Är du säker på att du vill återställa standardkonfigurationen för kontrollen?
Alla delade bindningar och konfiguration kommer att gå förlorade, men dina inmatningsprofiler kommer att finnas kvar.
Du kan inte ångra denna åtgärd.

trans-unit.resname: CoverDownloadDialog['PCSX2 can automatically download covers for games which do not currently have a cover set. We do not host any cover images, the user must provide their own source for images.']
trans-unit.source: PCSX2 can automatically download covers for games which do not currently have a cover set. We do not host any cover images, the user must provide their own source for images.
trans-unit.target: PCSX2 kan automatiskt hämta ner omslag för spel som för närvarande inte har ett valt omslag. Vi erbjuder ingen tjänst för att hämta omslagsbilder, användaren måste tillhandahålla sin egen källa för bilder.

trans-unit.resname: CoverDownloadDialog['{[=-lt;-=]}html{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}head/{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}body{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}In the box below, specify the URLs to download covers from, with one template URL per line. The following variables are available:{[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}span style={[=-quot;-=]} font-style:italic;{[=-quot;-=]}{[=-gt;-=]}${title}:{[=-lt;-=]}/span{[=-gt;-=]} Title of the game.{[=-lt;-=]}br/{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}span style={[=-quot;-=]} font-style:italic;
trans-unit.source: <html><head/><body><p>In the box below, specify the URLs to download covers from, with one template URL per line. The following variables are available:</p><p><span style=" font-style:italic;">${title}:</span> Title of the game.<br/><span style=" font-style:italic;">${filetitle}:</span> Name component of the game's filename.<br/><span style=" font-style:italic;">${serial}:</span> Serial of the game.</p><p><span style=" font-weight:700;">Example:</span> https://www.example-not-a-real-domain.com/covers/${serial}.jpg</p></body></html>
trans-unit.target: <html><head/><body><p>Ange URLer i rutan nedan att hämta omslagsbilder från, med en mall-URL per rad. Följande variabler finns tillgängliga:</p><p><span style=" font-style:italic;">${title}:</span> Spelets titel.<br/><span style=" font-style:italic;">${filetitle}:</span> Namnkomponenten för spelets filnamn.<br/><span style=" font-style:italic;">${serial}:</span> Serienumret för spelet.</p><p><span style=" font-weight:700;">Exempel:</span> https://www.exampel-inte-en-riktig-domän.se/covers/${serial}.jpg</p></body></html>
trans-unit.note: What is the "name component"?

trans-unit.resname: CoverDownloadDialog['By default, the downloaded covers will be saved with the game{[=-apos;-=]}s serial to ensure covers do not break with GameDB changes and that titles with multiple regions do not conflict. If this is not desired, you can check the {[=-quot;-=]}Use Title File Names{[=-quot;-=]} box below.']
trans-unit.source: By default, the downloaded covers will be saved with the game's serial to ensure covers do not break with GameDB changes and that titles with multiple regions do not conflict. If this is not desired, you can check the "Use Title File Names" box below.
trans-unit.target: Som standard kommer de hämtade omslagen sparas med spelets serienummer för att se till att omslagen fungerar med GameDB-ändringar och att speltitlar med flera regioner inte kommer i konflikt. Om detta inte är önskat kan du markera i "Använd speltitel för filnamn" nedan.

trans-unit.note: This is the "Start" button for downloading covers.

trans-unit.source: Internal DNS can be selected using the DNS1/2 dropdowns, or by setting them to 192.0.2.1

Not translating because there are no good Norwegian equivelants.
Not translating because there are no good Norwegian equivelants.
@ninekain As much as I'd love to translate this name, it refers to network sockets, which is widely known in the Spanish-speaking world in English.
Same as @IlDucci in Portuguese we also refer to network sockets as sockets.
Network Sockets, are the equivalent as Connections or Electricity Sockets where you can plug stuff in. But yeah for other languages probably won't think of using sockets for network stuff.
Pretty sure this is supposed to be "host name" and not "url"

This is the title for the file dialog that opens when you click on the "Import" button in "PCSX2 Settings -> Network & HDD -> Ethernet -> Internal DNS". By default, it looks for a file called "hosts.ini". I never used this functionality, can the file have a different name? Should I leave "Hosts" part of the translation string as is?
@mkfmtr I just saw that the file is named "hosts.ini", instead of just ".hosts". I'd say you can translate "hosts" if the Internet-related term has a translation for your language.
Do translate it, the `hosts.ini` is just a default file name, not a requirement. For reference, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hosts_(file)

I don't think this should be translated. I have never seen anyone using "Ana Bilgisayar" for hosts. The hosts file is always "hosts.ini" But in any case, Wikipedia translation of it is "Sunucu dosyası" Because the file contains server domains and IPs.

trans-unit.resname: DebugAnalysisSettingsWidget['Demangle C++ symbols during the import process so that the function and global variable names shown in the debugger are more readable.']

trans-unit.target: Demanglera C++-symboler under importprocessen så att funktions- och globala variabelnamn som visas i felsökaren blir mer läsbara.

trans-unit.source: Choose where the function scanner looks to find functions. This option can be useful if the application loads additional code at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Välj var funktionsscannern letar efter funktioner. Det här alternativet kan vara användbart om programmet läser in ytterligare kod vid körning.

trans-unit.resname: DebugAnalysisSettingsWidget['Whether to look for functions from the address range specified (Checked), or from the ELF segment containing the entry point (Unchecked).']
trans-unit.source: Whether to look for functions from the address range specified (Checked), or from the ELF segment containing the entry point (Unchecked).
trans-unit.target: Om funktioner ska sökas från det angivna adressområdet (Checked) eller från ELF-segmentet som innehåller inmatningspunkten (Unchecked).

trans-unit.resname: DebugAnalysisSettingsWidget['Generate hashes for all the detected functions, and gray out the symbols displayed in the debugger for functions that no longer match.']

trans-unit.resname: DebugSettingsWidget['These settings control what and when analysis passes should be performed on the program running in the virtual machine so that the resultant information can be shown in the debugger.']

trans-unit.target: Dessa inställningar styr vad och när analyspass ska utföras på programmet som körs i den virtuella maskinen så att den resulterande informationen kan visas i felsökaren.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Sets the target emulation speed. It is not guaranteed that this speed will be reached, and if not, the emulator will run as fast as it can manage.']
trans-unit.source: Sets the target emulation speed. It is not guaranteed that this speed will be reached, and if not, the emulator will run as fast as it can manage.
trans-unit.target: Ange målets emuleringshastighet. Det är inte säkert att denna hastighet kommer att nås, och om inte, så kommer emulatorn att köra så fort den kan.
trans-unit.note: seems like an odd wording in original english. doesn't specify that it will run as fast as it can manage when the target speed is not locked to the specific percentage, could be just me though

@nikivarvar I think it's fine, you set the target speed, it will go at that speed if you have enough CPU power, if not, it will go as fast as possible (below the target speed). it's nothing about the target speed not being locked, the target speed is always the target speed, if you can manage that or not depends on your CPU/GPU
thank you for clearing that up!
This string will appear after the text "Recommended Value:"
This refers to the recommended value for each option, seen in the hint box after the text "Recommended Value:".

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Higher values may increase internal framerate in games, but will increase CPU requirements substantially. Lower values will reduce the CPU load allowing lightweight games to run full speed on weaker CPUs.']
trans-unit.source: Higher values may increase internal framerate in games, but will increase CPU requirements substantially. Lower values will reduce the CPU load allowing lightweight games to run full speed on weaker CPUs.
trans-unit.target: Högre värden kan öka intern bildfrekvens i spel, men kommer att öka CPU-kraven avsevärt. Lägre värden kommer att minska CPU-belastningen så att lätta spel att köra full hastighet på svagare processorer.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Makes the emulated Emotion Engine skip cycles. Helps a small subset of games like SOTC. Most of the time it{[=-apos;-=]}s harmful to performance.']
trans-unit.source: Makes the emulated Emotion Engine skip cycles. Helps a small subset of games like SOTC. Most of the time it's harmful to performance.
trans-unit.target: Låter den emulerade Emotion Engine hoppa över cykler. Hjälper en liten delmängd av spel, t.ex. SOTC. Merparten av tiden är det dock 's skadligt för prestandan.

context-group.context: SOTC = Shadow of the Colossus. A game's title, should not be translated unless an official translation exists. EmulationSettingsWidget ../Settings/EmulationSettingsWidget.cpp:120

trans-unit.note: SOTC = Shadow of the Colossus.
This refers to the recommended value for each option, seen in the hint box after the text "Recommended Value:".

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Fast disc access, less loading times. Check HDLoader compatibility lists for known games that have issues with this.']
trans-unit.source: Fast disc access, less loading times. Check HDLoader compatibility lists for known games that have issues with this.
trans-unit.target: Snabb skivåtkomst, lägre inläsningstider. Kontrollera HDLoader-kompatibilitetslistor för kända spel som har problem med detta.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Automatically loads and applies cheats on game start.']
trans-unit.source: Automatically loads and applies cheats on game start.
trans-unit.target: Läser automatiskt in och tillämpar fusk vid spelstart.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Allows games and homebrew to access files / folders directly on the host computer.']
trans-unit.source: Allows games and homebrew to access files / folders directly on the host computer.
trans-unit.target: Ger spel och homebrew åtkomst till filer/mappar direkt på värddatorn.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Sets the fast-forward speed. This speed will be used when the fast-forward hotkey is pressed/toggled.']
trans-unit.source: Sets the fast-forward speed. This speed will be used when the fast-forward hotkey is pressed/toggled.
trans-unit.target: Anger hastigheten för snabbspolning. Denna hastighet kommer användas när snabbspolningsknappen hålls in/aktiveras.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Sets the slow-motion speed. This speed will be used when the slow-motion hotkey is pressed/toggled.']
trans-unit.source: Sets the slow-motion speed. This speed will be used when the slow-motion hotkey is pressed/toggled.
trans-unit.target: Sätter slow-motion hastighet. Denna hastighet kommer att användas när snabbtangenten för slow-motion hålls ned/aktiveras.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Sets the priority for specific threads in a specific order ignoring the system scheduler. May help CPUs with big (P) and little (E) cores (e.g. Intel 12th or newer generation CPUs from Intel or other vendors such as AMD).']
trans-unit.source: Sets the priority for specific threads in a specific order ignoring the system scheduler. May help CPUs with big (P) and little (E) cores (e.g. Intel 12th or newer generation CPUs from Intel or other vendors such as AMD).
trans-unit.target: Ställer in prioritet för specifika trådar i en specifik ordning och ignorerar systemplaneraren. Kan hjälpa processorer med stora (P) och små (E) kärnor (t.ex. Intels 12e eller nyare generationers processorer från Intel eller andra leverantörer som AMD).

context-group.context: P-Core = Performance Core, E-Core = Efficiency Core. See if Intel has official translations for these terms. EmulationSettingsWidget ../Settings/EmulationSettingsWidget.cpp:124

trans-unit.note: "Intel 12th or newer generation CPUs from Intel or other vendors such as AMD" might need to be reworded

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Generally a speedup on CPUs with 4 or more cores. Safe for most games, but a few are incompatible and may hang.']
trans-unit.source: Generally a speedup on CPUs with 4 or more cores. Safe for most games, but a few are incompatible and may hang.
trans-unit.target: Generellt en hastighetsökning på processorer med 4 eller fler kärnor. Säkert för de flesta spel, men några är inkompatibla och kan haka upp sig.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Loads the disc image into RAM before starting the virtual machine. Can reduce stutter on systems with hard drives that have long wake times, but significantly increases boot times.']
trans-unit.source: Loads the disc image into RAM before starting the virtual machine. Can reduce stutter on systems with hard drives that have long wake times, but significantly increases boot times.
trans-unit.target: Läser in skivavbilden i RAM-minnet innan den virtuella maskinen startar. Kan minska ryckighet på system med hårddiskar som har långa uppvakningstider, men ökar avsevärt uppstartstiden.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Sets the VSync queue size to 0, making every frame be completed and presented by the GS before input is polled and the next frame begins. Using this setting can reduce input lag at the cost of measurably higher CPU and GPU requirements.']
trans-unit.source: Sets the VSync queue size to 0, making every frame be completed and presented by the GS before input is polled and the next frame begins. Using this setting can reduce input lag at the cost of measurably higher CPU and GPU requirements.
trans-unit.target: Sätter VSync-köstorleken till 0, vilket gör att varje bildruta färdigställs och presenteras av GS innan inmatning registreras och nästa bildruta påbörjas. Att använda denna inställning kan minska inmatningsfördröjningen till priset av märkbart högre CPU- och GPU-krav.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Sets the maximum number of frames that can be queued up to the GS, before the CPU thread will wait for one of them to complete before continuing. Higher values can assist with smoothing out irregular frame times, but add additional input lag.']
trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum number of frames that can be queued up to the GS, before the CPU thread will wait for one of them to complete before continuing. Higher values can assist with smoothing out irregular frame times, but add additional input lag.
trans-unit.target: Sätter det maximala antalet bildrutor som kan köas upp till GS innan CPU-tråden väntar på att en av dem ska färdigställas innan den fortsätter. Högre värden kan hjälpa till att jämna ut ojämna frame times, men lägger till extra inmatningsfördröjning.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Speeds up emulation so that the guest refresh rate matches the host. This results in the smoothest animations possible, at the cost of potentially increasing the emulation speed by less than 1%. Sync to Host Refresh Rate will not take effect if the console{[=-apos;-=]}s refresh rate is too far from the host{[=-apos;-=]}s refresh rate. Users with variable refresh rate displays should disable this option.']
trans-unit.source: Speeds up emulation so that the guest refresh rate matches the host. This results in the smoothest animations possible, at the cost of potentially increasing the emulation speed by less than 1%. Sync to Host Refresh Rate will not take effect if the console's refresh rate is too far from the host's refresh rate. Users with variable refresh rate displays should disable this option.
trans-unit.target: Snabbar upp emuleringen så att gästsystemets uppdateringsfrekvens matchar värdens. Detta resulterar i så mjuka animationer som möjligt, till priset av att emuleringshastigheten potentiellt kan öka med mindre än 1%. Synkronisering till värdens uppdateringsfrekvens kommer inte att ha någon effekt om konsolens uppdateringsfrekvens är för långt ifrån värdens. Användare med skärmar som har variabel uppdateringsfrekvens bör inaktivera detta alternativ.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Enable this option to match PCSX2{[=-apos;-=]}s refresh rate with your current monitor or screen. VSync is automatically disabled when it is not possible (eg. running at non-100% speed).']
trans-unit.source: Enable this option to match PCSX2's refresh rate with your current monitor or screen. VSync is automatically disabled when it is not possible (eg. running at non-100% speed).
trans-unit.target: Aktivera detta alternativ för att matcha PCSX2s uppdateringsfrekvens med din nuvarande bildskärm. VSync inaktiveras automatiskt när det inte är möjligt (t.ex. när du kör med långsammare än 100% hastighet).

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['When synchronizing with the host refresh rate, this option disable{[=-apos;-=]}s PCSX2{[=-apos;-=]}s internal frame timing, and uses the host instead. Can result in smoother frame pacing, {[=-lt;-=]}strong{[=-gt;-=]}but at the cost of increased input latency{[=-lt;-=]}/strong{[=-gt;-=]}.']
trans-unit.source: When synchronizing with the host refresh rate, this option disable's PCSX2's internal frame timing, and uses the host instead. Can result in smoother frame pacing, <strong>but at the cost of increased input latency</strong>.
trans-unit.target: När man synkroniserar med värdens uppdateringsfrekvens, inaktiverar detta alternativ PCSX2s interna frame timing och använder istället värdens. Det kan resultera i jämnare <strong>frame pacing, men till priset av ökad inmatningsfördröjning </strong>.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Manually set a real-time clock to use for the virtual PlayStation 2 instead of using your OS{[=-apos;-=]} system clock.']
trans-unit.source: Manually set a real-time clock to use for the virtual PlayStation 2 instead of using your OS' system clock.
trans-unit.target: Ställ manuellt in realtidsklockan att använda för denna virtuella PlayStation 2 istället för att använda systemklockan för ditt operativsystem.

trans-unit.resname: EmulationSettingsWidget['Real-time clock (RTC) used by the virtual PlayStation 2. Date format is the same as the one used by your OS. This time is only applied upon booting the PS2; changing it while in-game will have no effect. NOTE: This assumes you have your PS2 set to the default timezone of GMT+0 and default DST of Summer Time. Some games require an RTC date/time set after their release date.']
trans-unit.source: Real-time clock (RTC) used by the virtual PlayStation 2. Date format is the same as the one used by your OS. This time is only applied upon booting the PS2; changing it while in-game will have no effect. NOTE: This assumes you have your PS2 set to the default timezone of GMT+0 and default DST of Summer Time. Some games require an RTC date/time set after their release date.
trans-unit.target: Realtidsklockan (RTC) används av denna virtuella PlayStation 2. Datumformatet är det samma som används av ditt operativsystem. Denna tid tillämpas endast vid uppstart av PS2; ändring av den under speltid har ingen effekt. OBSERVERA: Detta antar att du har din PS2 inställd till standardtidszonen GMT+0 och som standard sommartid. Vissa spel kräver datum/tid för RTC efter sitt lanseringsdatum.
trans-unit.note: NOTE FOR TRANSLATORS: this string contains texts that can be found within the PS2 BIOS and should be taken from there (go to System Settings, then press Triangle at the Clock Settings menu): - Time Zone - GMT+0 - DST - Summer Time

@ninekain The RAE says that Spanish (Spain, can't say the same about the rest of the world) requires a space (or for computing, a Non-Breaking Space to avoid separation of the number and the symbol) between a number and the percentage symbol.

context-group.context: Windows action to show a file in Windows Explorer FileOperations ../QtUtils.cpp:163

trans-unit.note: Maybe this should be "Show in Explorer" instead?

@HarmfulBreeze Other apps also use the expression "Show in Folder" to open any explorer (maybe to be OS-agnostic?) in the specific folder. I just checked Telegram for Desktop and does have a "Show in Folder" option.

@IlDucci Interesting. You could also argue that "Folder" is not OS-agnostic and therefore "Directory" should be used instead. I also believe that "Explorer" is a more generic term than "Folder". But yeah, 4 months after my original comment, I think "Open file location" might be the most natural and OS-agnostic out of all of them?

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Changes the BIOS image used to start future sessions.']

trans-unit.resname:
FullscreenUI['WARNING: Your memory card is still writing data. Shutting down now will IRREVERSIBLY DESTROY YOUR MEMORY CARD. It is strongly recommended to resume your game and let it finish writing to your memory card.
Do you wish to shutdown anyways and IRREVERSIBLY DESTROY YOUR MEMORY CARD?']
trans-unit.source:
WARNING: Your memory card is still writing data. Shutting down now will IRREVERSIBLY DESTROY YOUR MEMORY CARD. It is strongly recommended to resume your game and let it finish writing to your memory card.
Do you wish to shutdown anyways and IRREVERSIBLY DESTROY YOUR MEMORY CARD?
trans-unit.target:
VARNING: Ditt minneskort skriver fortfarande data. Om du stänger ner nu kommer du IRREVERSIBELT FÖRSTÖRA DITT MINNESKORT. Det rekommenderas starkt att återuppta ditt spel och låta det skriva klart till ditt minneskort.
Vill du stänga av i alla fall och IRREVERSIBELT FÖRSTÖRA DITT MINNESKORT?

trans-unit.source: Synchronizes frame presentation with host refresh.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Determines the resolution at which screenshots will be saved.']
trans-unit.source: Determines the resolution at which screenshots will be saved.

trans-unit.source: Selects the format which will be used to save screenshots.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Increases or decreases the virtual picture size vertically.']

trans-unit.source: Crops the image, while respecting aspect ratio.

trans-unit.source: Smooths out the image when upscaling the console to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Jämnar ut bilden vid uppskalning av konsolen till skärmen.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Adds padding to the display area to ensure that the ratio between pixels on the host to pixels in the console is an integer number. May result in a sharper image in some 2D games.']
trans-unit.source: Adds padding to the display area to ensure that the ratio between pixels on the host to pixels in the console is an integer number. May result in a sharper image in some 2D games.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till utfyllnad till visningsområdet för att säkerställa att förhållandet mellan pixlar på värden till pixlar i konsolen är ett heltal. Kan resultera i en skarpare bild i några 2D-spel.
trans-unit.note: WARNING: Possible short space constraint in Big Picture. Make sure you check this string in-app.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Enables PCRTC Offsets which position the screen as the game requests.']
trans-unit.source: Enables PCRTC Offsets which position the screen as the game requests.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverar PCRTC Offsets som positionerar skärmen som spelet efterfrågar.
trans-unit.note: Hint for translators: this is the first phrase of the longer QT version. Try to search for it.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Enables the option to show the overscan area on games which draw more than the safe area of the screen.']

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Enables internal Anti-Blur hacks. Less accurate to PS2 rendering but will make a lot of games look less blurry.']
trans-unit.source: Enables internal Anti-Blur hacks. Less accurate to PS2 rendering but will make a lot of games look less blurry.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the render resolution by the specified factor (upscaling).
trans-unit.target: Multiplicerar renderingsupplösningen med den angivna faktorn (uppskalning).

trans-unit.source: Selects where trilinear filtering is utilized when rendering textures.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Uploads full textures to the GPU on use, rather than only the utilized regions. Can improve performance in some games.']
trans-unit.source: Uploads full textures to the GPU on use, rather than only the utilized regions. Can improve performance in some games.
trans-unit.target: Läser in fullständiga texturer till GPU vid användning, snarare än bara de utnyttjade regionerna. Kan förbättra prestanda i vissa spel.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Number of threads to use in addition to the main GS thread for rasterization.']
trans-unit.source: Number of threads to use in addition to the main GS thread for rasterization.
trans-unit.target: Antal trådar att använda utöver huvudsakliga GS-tråden för rasterisering.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Force a primitive flush when a framebuffer is also an input texture.']
trans-unit.source: Force a primitive flush when a framebuffer is also an input texture.
trans-unit.target: Tvinga en primitiv spolning när en framebuffer är också en inmatningstextur.
trans-unit.note: Hint for translators: this is the first phrase of a longer string in QT. Please search for it.

Context mentioned in Discord: Guessing it's primitives being flushed, but I'd want to see context / file to confirm On a real GS, primitives are drawn as they're received, but modern GPUs like big lists of primitives, so we collect primitives in a buffer until the game does something like change draw settings that forces us to finish the list, encode a draw call, and start a new buffer (which we call "flushing").

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Enables emulation of the GS{[=-apos;-=]}s edge anti-aliasing (AA1).']

trans-unit.source: Attempts to reduce the texture size when games do not set it themselves (e.g. Snowblind games).

Justerar vertikaler i förhållande till uppskalning.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Resets all configuration to defaults (including bindings).']
trans-unit.source: Resets all configuration to defaults (including bindings).
trans-unit.target: Nollställer all konfiguration till standardvärden (inklusive bindningar).

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Replaces these settings with a previously saved input profile.']
trans-unit.source: Replaces these settings with a previously saved input profile.
trans-unit.target: Ersätter dessa inställningar med en tidigare sparad inmatningsprofil.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Stores the current settings to an input profile.']
trans-unit.source: Stores the current settings to an input profile.
trans-unit.target: Lagrar aktuella inställningar till en inmatningsprofil.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['The SDL input source supports most controllers.']
trans-unit.source: The SDL input source supports most controllers.
trans-unit.note: Tip for translators: this phrase can be found in the QT interface. Please search for it.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Provides vibration and LED control support over Bluetooth.']
trans-unit.source: Provides vibration and LED control support over Bluetooth.
trans-unit.target: Ger stöd för vibrations- och LED-styrning via Bluetooth.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Allow SDL to use raw access to input devices.']
trans-unit.source: Allow SDL to use raw access to input devices.
trans-unit.target: Tillåt SDL att använda rå åtkomst till inmatningsenheter.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['The XInput source provides support for XBox 360/XBox One/XBox Series controllers.']
trans-unit.source: The XInput source provides support for XBox 360/XBox One/XBox Series controllers.
trans-unit.target: XInput-källan ger stöd för XBox 360/XBox One/XBox Series-kontroller.
trans-unit.note: Tip for translators: this phrase can be found in the QT interface. Please search for it.
Multitap is best the same as it's a Sony Term, though if necessary you can translate

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Enables an additional three controller slots. Not supported in all games.']
trans-unit.source: Enables an additional three controller slots. Not supported in all games.
trans-unit.target: Möjliggör ytterligare tre platser för styrenheter. Stöds inte i alla spel.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Attempts to map the selected port to a chosen controller.']
trans-unit.source: Attempts to map the selected port to a chosen controller.
trans-unit.target: Försöker mappa den valda porten till en vald styrenhet.
trans-unit.note: selected と chosen の違いを「選択した」と「選んだ」でニュアンスを伝えたんですが、両方とも「選択した」と翻訳されたのはなにか理由がありますか？ 選択は「多くの中から適当に選んだニュアンス」選んだは「厳選した」というようなニュアンスです。 あと言葉が二回繰り返されることを、日本語は嫌います。あとは投票でみなさんできめてください。まぁ、どっちでもいいんですが。
Attempts to map the selected port to a controller. is fine as a translation, it does duplicate for no real reason that fluffing.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Determines how much pressure is simulated when macro is active.']
trans-unit.source: Determines how much pressure is simulated when macro is active.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer hur mycket tryck som simuleras när makrot är aktivt.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Determines the pressure required to activate the macro.']
trans-unit.source: Determines the pressure required to activate the macro.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer trycket som krävs för att aktivera makrot.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Clears all bindings for this USB controller.']
trans-unit.source: Clears all bindings for this USB controller.
trans-unit.target: Tömmer alla bindningar för denna USB-kontroller.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Changing these options may cause games to become non-functional. Modify at your own risk, the PCSX2 team will not provide support for configurations with these settings changed.']
trans-unit.source: Changing these options may cause games to become non-functional. Modify at your own risk, the PCSX2 team will not provide support for configurations with these settings changed.
trans-unit.target: Om du ändrar dessa alternativ kan det leda till att spelen inte fungerar som de ska. Modifiera på egen risk, PCSX2-teamet kommer inte att ge support för konfigurationer med dessa inställningar ändrade.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Writes log messages to the system console (console window/standard output).']
trans-unit.source: Writes log messages to the system console (console window/standard output).

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Writes dev log messages to log sinks.']
trans-unit.source: Writes dev log messages to log sinks.

trans-unit.target: Skriver tidsstämplar vid sidan om loggmeddelanden.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Writes debug messages from the game{[=-apos;-=]}s EE code to the console.']
trans-unit.source: Writes debug messages from the game's EE code to the console.
trans-unit.target: Skriver felsökningsmeddelanden från spelets EE-kod till konsolen.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Writes debug messages from the game{[=-apos;-=]}s IOP code to the console.']
trans-unit.source: Writes debug messages from the game's IOP code to the console.
trans-unit.target: Skriver felsökningsmeddelanden från spelets IOP-kod till konsolen.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Determines how the results of floating-point operations are rounded. Some games need specific settings.']
trans-unit.source: Determines how the results of floating-point operations are rounded. Some games need specific settings.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer hur resultatet av operationer med flyttal avrundas. Vissa spel behöver specifika inställningar.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Determines how the results of floating-point division is rounded. Some games need specific settings.']
trans-unit.source: Determines how the results of floating-point division is rounded. Some games need specific settings.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer hur resultatet av division med flyttal avrundas. Vissa spel behöver specifika inställningar.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Determines how out-of-range floating point numbers are handled. Some games need specific settings.']
trans-unit.source: Determines how out-of-range floating point numbers are handled. Some games need specific settings.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer hur flyttal som ligger utanför intervallet ska hanteras. Vissa spel behöver specifika inställningar.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Performs just-in-time binary translation of 64-bit MIPS-IV machine code to native code.']
trans-unit.source: Performs just-in-time binary translation of 64-bit MIPS-IV machine code to native code.
trans-unit.target: Utför just-in-time binär översättning av 64-bitars MIPS-IV-maskinkod till inbyggd kod.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Enables simulation of the EE{[=-apos;-=]}s cache. Slow.']
trans-unit.source: Enables simulation of the EE's cache. Slow.
trans-unit.target: Möjliggör simulering av EE:s cache. Långsam.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Huge speedup for some games, with almost no compatibility side effects.']
trans-unit.source: Huge speedup for some games, with almost no compatibility side effects.
trans-unit.target: Mycket bra uppsnabbning för vissa spel med nästan inga kompatibilitetsproblem.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Moderate speedup for some games, with no known side effects.']
trans-unit.source: Moderate speedup for some games, with no known side effects.
trans-unit.target: Måttlig hastighetshöjning för vissa spel, utan några kända biverkningar.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Uses backpatching to avoid register flushing on every memory access.']
trans-unit.source: Uses backpatching to avoid register flushing on every memory access.
trans-unit.target: Använder backpatching för att undvika registerspolning vid varje minnesåtkomst.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['New Vector Unit recompiler with much improved compatibility. Recommended.']
trans-unit.source: New Vector Unit recompiler with much improved compatibility. Recommended.
trans-unit.target: Ny Vector Unit-rekompilator med mycket förbättrad kompatibilitet. Rekommenderas.

trans-unit.note: It's about the VU Status Flag

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Good speedup and high compatibility, may cause graphical errors.']
trans-unit.source: Good speedup and high compatibility, may cause graphical errors.
trans-unit.target: Bra hastighet och hög kompatibilitet, kan orsaka grafiska fel.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Performs just-in-time binary translation of 32-bit MIPS-I machine code to native code.']
trans-unit.source: Performs just-in-time binary translation of 32-bit MIPS-I machine code to native code.
trans-unit.target: Utför just-in-time binär översättning av 32-bitars MIPS-I-maskinkod till inbyggd kod.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['No cheats are available for this game.']
trans-unit.source: No cheats are available for this game.
trans-unit.target: Det finns inga fusk tillgängliga för detta spel.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['No patches are available for this game.']
trans-unit.source: No patches are available for this game.
trans-unit.target: Det finns inga patchar tillgängliga för detta spel.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Activating cheats can cause unpredictable behavior, crashing, soft-locks, or broken saved games.']
trans-unit.source: Activating cheats can cause unpredictable behavior, crashing, soft-locks, or broken saved games.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Activating game patches can cause unpredictable behavior, crashing, soft-locks, or broken saved games.']
trans-unit.source: Activating game patches can cause unpredictable behavior, crashing, soft-locks, or broken saved games.
trans-unit.target: Aktivering av spelpatchar kan orsaka oförväntat beteende, krascher, låsningar eller trasiga sparade spel.
trans-unit.note: Tip for translators: this phrase is repeated in the QT interface. Please search for it.

WARNING FOR TRANSLATORS: this string has a high chance of overflowing the available space within Big Picture. Make sure you test this string and that it fits in a single line within a 4:3 aspect ratio.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Use patches at your own risk, the PCSX2 team will provide no support for users who have enabled game patches.']
trans-unit.source: Use patches at your own risk, the PCSX2 team will provide no support for users who have enabled game patches.
trans-unit.target: Använd patchar på egen risk, PCSX2-teamet kommer inte att ge någon support till användare som har aktiverat spelpatchar.
trans-unit.note: Tip for translators: this phrase is repeated in the QT interface. Please search for it.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Game fixes should not be modified unless you are aware of what each option does and the implications of doing so.']
trans-unit.source: Game fixes should not be modified unless you are aware of what each option does and the implications of doing so.
trans-unit.target: Game fixes bör inte ändras om du inte är medveten om vad varje alternativ gör och konsekvenserna av att göra det.
