Tip for translators: this phrase is repeated in the QT interface. Please search for it.
Tip for translators: this phrase is repeated in the QT interface. Please search for it.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Needed for some games with complex FMV rendering.']
trans-unit.source: Needed for some games with complex FMV rendering.
trans-unit.target: Behövs för vissa spel med komplexa FMV-renderingar.

trans-unit.note: Used to skip any FMV if detected by IPU (Image Processing Unit) essentially MPEG2 video files if detected, doesn't work always perfectly though in the way PS2 games can use it.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Skips videos/FMVs in games to avoid game hanging/freezes.']
trans-unit.source: Skips videos/FMVs in games to avoid game hanging/freezes.
trans-unit.target: Hoppar över videor/FMV:er i spel för att undvika att spelet hänger sig/fryser.

trans-unit.note: DMA = Direct Memory Access. Usually leave the acronym as-is.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Known to affect following games: Mana Khemia 1, Metal Saga, Pilot Down Behind Enemy Lines.']
trans-unit.source: Known to affect following games: Mana Khemia 1, Metal Saga, Pilot Down Behind Enemy Lines.
trans-unit.target: Känd för att påverka följande spel: Mana Khemia 1, Metal Saga, Pilot Down Behind Enemy Lines.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['For SOCOM 2 HUD and Spy Hunter loading hang.']
trans-unit.source: For SOCOM 2 HUD and Spy Hunter loading hang.
trans-unit.target: För inläsningshängning i SOCOM 2 HUD och Spy Hunter.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Forces tight VU0 sync on every COP2 instruction.']
trans-unit.source: Forces tight VU0 sync on every COP2 instruction.
trans-unit.target: Tvingar fram en tät VU0-synkronisering vid varje COP2-instruktion.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['To check for possible float overflows (Superman Returns).']
trans-unit.source: To check for possible float overflows (Superman Returns).
trans-unit.target: För att kontrollera eventuella överflöden av flottörer (Superman Returns).
trans-unit.note: possible という単語は「可能性」があることを示すようなのですが、https://ejje.weblio.jp/content/possible「可能な」としてしまうとニュアンスが変わるような気がします。 froatについては漢字表記にしています。

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Use accurate timing for VU XGKicks (slower).']
trans-unit.source: Use accurate timing for VU XGKicks (slower).
trans-unit.target: Använd exakt timing för VU XGKicks (långsammare).

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Makes the emulated Emotion Engine skip cycles. Helps a small subset of games like SOTC. Most of the time it{[=-apos;-=]}s harmful to performance.']
trans-unit.source: Makes the emulated Emotion Engine skip cycles. Helps a small subset of games like SOTC. Most of the time it's harmful to performance.
trans-unit.target: Gör så att den emulerade Emotion Engine hoppar över cykler. Hjälper en liten delmängd av spel som SOTC. För det mesta är det skadligt för prestandan.
trans-unit.note: WARNING: Possible short space constraint in Big Picture. Make sure you check this string in-app.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Generally a speedup on CPUs with 4 or more cores. Safe for most games, but a few are incompatible and may hang.']
trans-unit.source: Generally a speedup on CPUs with 4 or more cores. Safe for most games, but a few are incompatible and may hang.
trans-unit.target: Generellt sett en hastighetsökning på processorer med 4 eller fler kärnor. Säkert för de flesta spel, men några få är inkompatibla och kan hänga sig.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Runs VU1 instantly. Provides a modest speed improvement in most games. Safe for most games, but a few games may exhibit graphical errors.']
trans-unit.source: Runs VU1 instantly. Provides a modest speed improvement in most games. Safe for most games, but a few games may exhibit graphical errors.
trans-unit.target: Kör VU1 direkt. Ger en måttlig hastighetsförbättring i de flesta spel. Säkert för de flesta spel, men några spel kan uppvisa grafiska fel.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Disable the support of depth buffers in the texture cache.']
trans-unit.source: Disable the support of depth buffers in the texture cache.
trans-unit.target: Avaktivera stöd för djupbuffertar i texturcachen.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['When enabled GPU converts colormap-textures, otherwise the CPU will. It is a trade-off between GPU and CPU.']
trans-unit.source: When enabled GPU converts colormap-textures, otherwise the CPU will. It is a trade-off between GPU and CPU.
trans-unit.target: När det är aktiverat konverterar GPU colormap-texturer, annars gör CPU det. Det är en avvägning mellan GPU och CPU.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Dumps replaceable textures to disk. Will reduce performance.']
trans-unit.source: Dumps replaceable textures to disk. Will reduce performance.
trans-unit.target: Dumpar ersättningsbara texturer till disk. Kommer att minska prestandan.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Applies a shader which replicates the visual effects of different styles of television set.']
trans-unit.source: Applies a shader which replicates the visual effects of different styles of television set.
trans-unit.target: Använder en shader som återskapar de visuella effekterna av olika typer av TV-apparater.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Skips displaying frames that don{[=-apos;-=]}t change in 25/30fps games. Can improve speed, but increase input lag/make frame pacing worse.']
trans-unit.source: Skips displaying frames that don't change in 25/30fps games. Can improve speed, but increase input lag/make frame pacing worse.
trans-unit.target: Hoppar över att visa bildrutor som inte ändras i spel med 25/30 bilder per sekund. Kan förbättra hastigheten, men öka input lag/försämra frame pacing.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Enables API-level validation of graphics commands.']
trans-unit.source: Enables API-level validation of graphics commands.
trans-unit.target: Möjliggör validering av grafikkommandon på API-nivå.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['To avoid TLB miss on Goemon.']
trans-unit.source: To avoid TLB miss on Goemon.
trans-unit.target: För att undvika TLB-miss i Goemon.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['General-purpose timing hack. Known to affect following games: Digital Devil Saga, SSX.']
trans-unit.source: General-purpose timing hack. Known to affect following games: Digital Devil Saga, SSX.
trans-unit.target: Allmänt timing-hack. Känd för att påverka följande spel: Digital Devil Saga, SSX.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Good for cache emulation problems. Known to affect following games: Fire Pro Wrestling Z.']
trans-unit.source: Good for cache emulation problems. Known to affect following games: Fire Pro Wrestling Z.
trans-unit.target: Bra för problem med cache-emulering. Känd för att påverka följande spel: Fire Pro Wrestling Z.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Known to affect following games: Bleach Blade Battlers, Growlanser II and III, Wizardry.']
trans-unit.source: Known to affect following games: Bleach Blade Battlers, Growlanser II and III, Wizardry.
trans-unit.target: Känd för att påverka följande spel: Bleach Blade Battlers, Growlanser II och III, Wizardry.

trans-unit.note: GIF = Graphics InterFace. Leave acronym as-is. FIFO = First-In, First-Out Buffer. Leave acronym as-is.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Correct but slower. Known to affect the following games: Fifa Street 2.']
trans-unit.source: Correct but slower. Known to affect the following games: Fifa Street 2.
trans-unit.target: Korrekt men långsammare. Känd för att påverka följande spel: Fifa Street 2.
trans-unit.note: Isn't FIFA supposed to be spelt in all-caps?
DMA = Direct Memory Access. Usually leave the acronym as-is.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Simulate VIF1 FIFO read ahead. Known to affect following games: Test Drive Unlimited, Transformers.']
trans-unit.source: Simulate VIF1 FIFO read ahead. Known to affect following games: Test Drive Unlimited, Transformers.
trans-unit.target: Simulerar VIF1 FIFO-läsning framåt. Känd för att påverka följande spel: Test Drive Unlimited, Transformers.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Avoids constant recompilation in some games. Known to affect the following games: Scarface The World is Yours, Crash Tag Team Racing.']
trans-unit.source: Avoids constant recompilation in some games. Known to affect the following games: Scarface The World is Yours, Crash Tag Team Racing.
trans-unit.target: Undviker ständig omkompilering i vissa spel. Känd för att påverka följande spel: Scarface The World is Yours, Crash Tag Team Racing.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['For Tri-Ace Games: Star Ocean 3, Radiata Stories, Valkyrie Profile 2.']
trans-unit.source: For Tri-Ace Games: Star Ocean 3, Radiata Stories, Valkyrie Profile 2.
trans-unit.target: För Tri-Ace Games: Star Ocean 3, Radiata Stories, Valkyrie Profile 2.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Run behind. To avoid sync problems when reading or writing VU registers.']
trans-unit.source: Run behind. To avoid sync problems when reading or writing VU registers.
trans-unit.target: Kör efter. För att undvika synkroniseringsproblem vid läsning eller skrivning av fordonsregister.

trans-unit.note: I think both translation is not correct

trans-unit.resname:
FullscreenUI['A resume save state created at %s was found.
Do you want to load this save and continue?']
trans-unit.source:
A resume save state created at %s was found.
Do you want to load this save and continue?
trans-unit.target:
Ett återskapat sparat tillstånd som skapades %s har hittats.
Vill du läsa in detta tillstånd och fortsätta?

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Adds a new directory to the game search list.']
trans-unit.source: Adds a new directory to the game search list.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en ny katalog till spelsökningslistan.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Sets which view the game list will open to.']
trans-unit.source: Sets which view the game list will open to.
trans-unit.target: Anger vilken vy som spellistan ska öppnas med.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Determines which field the game list will be sorted by.']
trans-unit.source: Determines which field the game list will be sorted by.
trans-unit.target: Fastställer vilka fält som spellistan ska sorteras efter.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Reverses the game list sort order from the default (usually ascending to descending).']
trans-unit.source: Reverses the game list sort order from the default (usually ascending to descending).
trans-unit.target: Väntar på spellistans sorteringsordning från standard (vanligtvis stigande till fallande).

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Downloads covers from a user-specified URL template.']
trans-unit.source: Downloads covers from a user-specified URL template.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ner omslag från en användardefinierad URL-mall.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Selects where anisotropic filtering is utilized when rendering textures.']
trans-unit.source: Selects where anisotropic filtering is utilized when rendering textures.
trans-unit.target: Väljer var anisotropisk filtrering ska användas vid rendering av texturer.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Use alternative method to calculate internal FPS to avoid false readings in some games.']
trans-unit.source: Use alternative method to calculate internal FPS to avoid false readings in some games.
trans-unit.target: Använd en alternativ metod för att beräkna interna FPS för att undvika felaktiga avläsningar i vissa spel.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Identifies any new files added to the game directories.']
trans-unit.source: Identifies any new files added to the game directories.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar alla nya filer som lagts till i spelkatalogerna.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Forces a full rescan of all games previously identified.']
trans-unit.source: Forces a full rescan of all games previously identified.
trans-unit.target: Forcerar en fullständig omskanning av alla spel som tidigare identifierats.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['PCSX2 is a free and open-source PlayStation 2 (PS2) emulator. Its purpose is to emulate the PS2{[=-apos;-=]}s hardware, using a combination of MIPS CPU Interpreters, Recompilers and a Virtual Machine which manages hardware states and PS2 system memory. This allows you to play PS2 games on your PC, with many additional features and benefits.']
trans-unit.source: PCSX2 is a free and open-source PlayStation 2 (PS2) emulator. Its purpose is to emulate the PS2's hardware, using a combination of MIPS CPU Interpreters, Recompilers and a Virtual Machine which manages hardware states and PS2 system memory. This allows you to play PS2 games on your PC, with many additional features and benefits.
trans-unit.target: PCSX2 är en PlayStation 2 (PS2) emulator med fri och öppen källkod. Dess syfte är att emulera PS2's hårdvara med hjälp av en kombination av MIPS-processortolkar, Recompilers och en virtuell maskin som hanterar hårdvarutillstånd och PS2-systemminne. På så sätt kan du spela PS2-spel på din dator med många ytterligare funktioner och fördelar.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['PlayStation 2 and PS2 are registered trademarks of Sony Interactive Entertainment. This application is not affiliated in any way with Sony Interactive Entertainment.']
trans-unit.source: PlayStation 2 and PS2 are registered trademarks of Sony Interactive Entertainment. This application is not affiliated in any way with Sony Interactive Entertainment.
trans-unit.target: PlayStation 2 och PS2 är registrerade varumärken som tillhör Sony Interactive Entertainment. Denna applikation är inte alls knuten till Sony Interactive Entertainment.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['When enabled and logged in, PCSX2 will scan for achievements on startup.']
trans-unit.source: When enabled and logged in, PCSX2 will scan for achievements on startup.
trans-unit.target: När detta är aktiverat och du är inloggad kommer PCSX2 leta efter prestationer när spelet startas.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['{[=-quot;-=]}Challenge{[=-quot;-=]} mode for achievements, including leaderboard tracking. Disables save state, cheats, and slowdown functions.']
trans-unit.source: "Challenge" mode for achievements, including leaderboard tracking. Disables save state, cheats, and slowdown functions.
trans-unit.target: "Utmaningsläget" för prestationer, inklusive koll på topplistor. Inaktiverar sparat tillstånd, fusk och funktioner för sakta körning.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Displays popup messages on events such as achievement unlocks and leaderboard submissions.']
trans-unit.source: Displays popup messages on events such as achievement unlocks and leaderboard submissions.
trans-unit.target: Visar popupmeddelanden vid händelser såsom upplåsning av prestationer och inskickning av topplistor.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Plays sound effects for events such as achievement unlocks and leaderboard submissions.']
trans-unit.source: Plays sound effects for events such as achievement unlocks and leaderboard submissions.
trans-unit.target: Spelar upp ljudeffekter för händelser såsom en prestation låses upp och insändningar till topplistor.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Shows icons in the lower-right corner of the screen when a challenge/primed achievement is active.']
trans-unit.source: Shows icons in the lower-right corner of the screen when a challenge/primed achievement is active.
trans-unit.target: Visar ikoner i nedre högra hörnet av skärmen när en utmatning/primed prestation är aktiv.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['When enabled, PCSX2 will list achievements from unofficial sets. These achievements are not tracked by RetroAchievements.']
trans-unit.source: When enabled, PCSX2 will list achievements from unofficial sets. These achievements are not tracked by RetroAchievements.
trans-unit.target: När den är aktiverad kommer PCSX2 att lista prestationer från inofficiella uppsättningar. Dessa prestationer spåras inte av RetroAchievements.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['When enabled, PCSX2 will assume all achievements are locked and not send any unlock notifications to the server.']
trans-unit.source: When enabled, PCSX2 will assume all achievements are locked and not send any unlock notifications to the server.
trans-unit.target: När detta är aktiverat kommer PCSX2 anta att alla prestationer är låsta och inte skicka några upplåsningsmeddelanden till servern.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Pauses the emulator when a controller with bindings is disconnected.']
trans-unit.source: Pauses the emulator when a controller with bindings is disconnected.
trans-unit.target: Pausar emulatorn när en handkontroller med bindningar kopplas från.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Creates a backup copy of a save state if it already exists when the save is created. The backup copy has a .backup suffix']
trans-unit.source: Creates a backup copy of a save state if it already exists when the save is created. The backup copy has a .backup suffix
trans-unit.target: Skapar en säkerhetskopia av ett sparat tillstånd om det redan finns när sparfilen skapas. Säkerhetskopian har suffixet .backup

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Loads the disc image into RAM before starting the virtual machine.']
trans-unit.source: Loads the disc image into RAM before starting the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Läser in skivavbilden till RAM innan den virtuella maskinen startar.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Disables PCSX2{[=-apos;-=]}s internal frame timing, and uses host vsync instead.']
trans-unit.source: Disables PCSX2's internal frame timing, and uses host vsync instead.
trans-unit.target: Avaktiverar PCSX2:s interna bildrutetidtagning och använder istället host vsync.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Forces the use of FIFO over Mailbox presentation, i.e. double buffering instead of triple buffering. Usually results in worse frame pacing.']
trans-unit.source: Forces the use of FIFO over Mailbox presentation, i.e. double buffering instead of triple buffering. Usually results in worse frame pacing.
trans-unit.target: Tvingar fram användning av FIFO i stället för Mailbox-presentation, dvs. dubbel buffring i stället för trippel buffring. Detta resulterar vanligen i sämre frame pacing.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Controls the volume of the audio played on the host.']
trans-unit.source: Controls the volume of the audio played on the host.
trans-unit.target: Styr volymen av ljudet som spelas av värden.

trans-unit.note: This is a setting that changes the audio volume when the user enables the fast forward mode (so users don't get nasty sounds or damage their speakers from high-pitched noises).

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Controls the volume of the audio played on the host when fast forwarding.']
trans-unit.source: Controls the volume of the audio played on the host when fast forwarding.
trans-unit.target: Styr volymen på det ljud som spelas upp på värden vid snabbspolning framåt.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Prevents the emulator from producing any audible sound.']
trans-unit.source: Prevents the emulator from producing any audible sound.
trans-unit.target: Förhindrar emulatorn från att producera något ljud.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['The audio backend determines how frames produced by the emulator are submitted to the host.']
trans-unit.source: The audio backend determines how frames produced by the emulator are submitted to the host.
trans-unit.target: Ljudbackend avgör hur ramar som produceras av emulatorn skickas till värden.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Determines how audio is expanded from stereo to surround for supported games.']
trans-unit.source: Determines how audio is expanded from stereo to surround for supported games.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer hur ljudet utökas från stereo till surround för spel som stöds.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Determines the amount of audio buffered before being pulled by the host API.']
trans-unit.source: Determines the amount of audio buffered before being pulled by the host API.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer hur mycket ljud som buffras innan det hämtas av värd-API:et.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Determines how much latency there is between the audio being picked up by the host API, and played through speakers.']
trans-unit.source: Determines how much latency there is between the audio being picked up by the host API, and played through speakers.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer hur stor fördröjning det är mellan det att ljudet plockas upp av värd-API:et och spelas upp i högtalarna.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['When enabled, the minimum supported output latency will be used for the host API.']
trans-unit.source: When enabled, the minimum supported output latency will be used for the host API.
trans-unit.target: När det är aktiverat, kommer den minsta tillåtna utmatningsfördröjningen att användas för ägande API.

trans-unit.resname: FullscreenUI['Displays popup messages when starting, submitting, or failing a leaderboard challenge.']

trans-unit.target: Visar popupmeddelanden vid start, insändning eller misslyckanden av en topplisteutmaning.

trans-unit.source: When enabled, each session will behave as if no achievements have been unlocked.

Question here: does this value changes the period to a comma depending on the user's unit settings or should it be changed here? I can't find this string in Big Picture right now.
@IlDucci If you switch to `{:.2Lf}`, you're at least telling fmt to try to match a locale, though I'm not sure it'll pick up the right one. I'll look into it later.
@TellowKrinkle I will wait for your confirmation, then.
WARNING: Limited space constraint. Abbreviate when needed.
WARNING: Limited space constraint. Abbreviate when needed.
WARNING: Limited space constraint. Abbreviate when needed.
WARNING: Limited space constraint. Abbreviate when needed.
NOTE: "Full" is used in Big Picture both for the EE Clamping and the Round Sprite settings.
This should probably simply be "Off"
@HarmfulBreeze Off (None) is fine, the other options are displayed like this.

@refraction "Désactivé (aucun)" is pretty unclear/unnatural in French. Usually in French we use "aucun <something>", "aucun" by itself is to be avoided. Another way to put it would be "Désactivé (aucun filtrage)", "Off (No Filtering)", but it's a little unclear too as people might think the option disables all filtering. I decided to translate it as "Désactivé", "Off".
The decision to update the source string is up to you :)

trans-unit.note: In France we're supposed to use Mo instead of MB, but PS2 memory card sizes were displayed in MB. I suggest to use the same unit even though Crowdin is unhappy.
Might need unification with QT
@HarmfulBreeze What's wrong with it? Looks the same to me..
@refraction missing spaces around the slash :)
@HarmfulBreeze That's really a nitpick and certainly a trivial problem, so just translate it as-is for now. If the words were wrong, I'd be more worried.
@refraction Already translated. I'm not saying this is a major issue either :)
"Chop/Zero" means here that decimal numbers will be "chopped", as in, removing the decimal values, towards zero. Meaning: 8.9 will become 8 and will not be rounded towards 9.
Can be reworded as such: "Load a profile".
Should this be a plural for buttons, as in "Buttons for Macro 1"?

@IlDucci Just took a look at big picture page where this string is: Is in the gamepad settings tab and it's for setting up macros with whatever controller you're using. You can make a macro with a single button press or you can make it with multiple simultaneous inputs, so it can be either singular or plural depending on how you set each macro. I think the safest thig to do is to leave it in plural as "botones de macro"
@IlDucci Either that or translating it to "Botón/botones de macro" but maybe that's diverging too far from the original string styling and worsen the UX
@TSnatch72 Thanks! I'm leaving the issue open as the need for pluralization might affect English as well.
Closing the issue as this was confirmed to mean "button/buttons for macro 1/2/3..."
Traducción verificada en manual de instrucciones para modelo de la consola comercializada para México.

trans-unit.resname: GS['Your system has the {[=-quot;-=]}OpenCL, OpenGL, and Vulkan Compatibility Pack{[=-quot;-=]} installed. This Vulkan driver crashes PCSX2 on some GPUs. To use the Vulkan renderer, you should remove this app package.']
trans-unit.source: Your system has the "OpenCL, OpenGL, and Vulkan Compatibility Pack" installed. This Vulkan driver crashes PCSX2 on some GPUs. To use the Vulkan renderer, you should remove this app package.
trans-unit.target: Ditt system har kompatibilitetspaket för "OpenCL, OpenGL och Vulkan" installerade. Denna Vulkan-drivrutin kraschar PCSX2 med vissa GPUer. Du bör ta bort detta paket för att använda Vulkan-renderaren.
trans-unit.note: OSD warning message, make sure it's properly formatted and has line jumps/newlines.

The Compatibility Pack has an official translation from Microsoft which can be found in the Store. Make sure you use it.
Spanish example: https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9NQPSL29BFFF?hl=es-ES&gl=US

trans-unit.resname: GS['The Vulkan renderer was automatically selected, but no compatible devices were found. You should update all graphics drivers in your system, including any integrated GPUs to use the Vulkan renderer.']

trans-unit.note: INFORMATION: the tabs in this string are used to justify the text to the right of the icon (this is an OSD message). trans-unit.resname: GameDatabase['Manual GS hardware renderer fixes are enabled, automatic fixes were not applied:']
trans-unit.source: Manual GS hardware renderer fixes are enabled, automatic fixes were not applied:
trans-unit.target: Manuella fixar för GS-hårdvarurenderare är aktiverade. Automatiska fixar tillämpades inte:

trans-unit.resname: GameDatabase['Data track number does not match data track in database.']
trans-unit.source: Data track number does not match data track in database.
trans-unit.target: Dataspårnumret matchar inte dataspåret i databasen.
trans-unit.note: This string refers to the number of the track (in singular) that contains data in a PS1/PS2 CD game disc. CD discs can contain multiple tracks, usually one data track and one or more audio tracks.

trans-unit.resname: GameDatabase['Track {0} with hash {1} is not found in database. ']
trans-unit.source: Track {0} with hash {1} is not found in database.
trans-unit.target: Spår {0} med kontrollsumma {1} finns inte i databasen.

trans-unit.resname: GameDatabase['Track {0} with hash {1} is for a different game ({2}). ']
trans-unit.source: Track {0} with hash {1} is for a different game ({2}).
trans-unit.target: Spår {0} med kontrollsumma {1} är för ett annat spel ({2}).

trans-unit.resname: GameDatabase['Track {0} with hash {1} does not match database track. ']
trans-unit.source: Track {0} with hash {1} does not match database track.
trans-unit.target: Spår {0} med kontrollsumma {1} matchar inte databasspåret.

context-group.context: FPU = Floating Point Unit. A part of the PS2's CPU. Do not translate.\nMultiply: mathematical term.\nTales of Destiny: a game's name. Leave as-is or use an official translation. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:62 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:39

MPEG: video codec, leave as-is. FMV: Full Motion Video. Find the common used term in your language. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:76 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:42

TLB: Translation Lookaside Buffer. Leave as-is. Goemon: name of a character from the series with his name. Leave as-is or use an official translation. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:83 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:40
EE: Emotion Engine. Leave as-is. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:90 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:44
DMA: Direct Memory Access. Leave as-is. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:97 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:45

trans-unit.note: DMA = Direct Memory Access. Usually leave the acronym as-is.

context-group.context: OPH: Name of a flag (Output PatH) in the GIF_STAT register in the EE. Leave as-is.\nBleach Blade Battles: a game's name. Leave as-is or use an official translation. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:104 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:43

GIF = GS (Graphics Synthesizer, the GPU) Interface. Leave as-is.\nFIFO = First-In-First-Out, a type of buffer. Leave as-is. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:111 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:47

trans-unit.note: GIF = Graphics InterFace. Leave acronym as-is. FIFO = First-In, First-Out Buffer. Leave acronym as-is.

context-group.context: DMA: Direct Memory Access. Leave as-is. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:118 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:46

trans-unit.note: DMA = Direct Memory Access. Usually leave the acronym as-is.

context-group.context: VIF = VU (Vector Unit) Interface. Leave as-is. SOCOM 2 and Spy Hunter: names of two different games. Leave as-is or use an official translation.\nHUD = Heads-Up Display. The games' interfaces. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:125 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:49

VIF = VU (Vector Unit) Interface. Leave as-is.\nFIFO = First-In-First-Out, a type of buffer. Leave as-is. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:132 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:48
VU0 = VU (Vector Unit) 0. Leave as-is. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:139 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:52

VU = Vector Unit. Leave as-is.\nI Bit = A bit referred as I, not as 1.\nScarface The World is Yours and Crash Tag Team Racing: names of two different games. Leave as-is or use an official translation. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:146 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:51
VU = Vector Unit. Leave as-is.\nTri-Ace: a game development company name. Leave as-is. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:153 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:50

VU = Vector Unit. Leave as-is.\nSuperman Returns: a game's name. Leave as-is or use an official translation. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:160 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:54

VU = Vector Unit. Leave as-is.\nRun Behind: watch out for misleading capitalization for non-English: this refers to making the VUs run behind (delayed relative to) the EE.\nM-Bit: a bitflag in VU instructions that tells VU0 to synchronize with the EE. M-Bit Game: A game that uses instructions with the M-Bit enabled (unofficial PCSX2 name). GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:167 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:53
VU = Vector Unit. Leave as-is.\nXGKick: the name of one of the VU's instructions. Leave as-is. GameFixSettingsWidget ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.ui:174 ../Settings/GameFixSettingsWidget.cpp:55

Blit = a data operation. You might want to write it as-is, but fully uppercased. More information: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bit_blit This option tells PCSX2 to estimate internal FPS by detecting blits (image copies) onto visible display memory. trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['To avoid TLB miss on Goemon.']
trans-unit.source: To avoid TLB miss on Goemon.
trans-unit.target: För att undvika TLB-miss i Goemon.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['Needed for some games with complex FMV rendering.']
trans-unit.source: Needed for some games with complex FMV rendering.
trans-unit.target: Behövs för vissa spel med komplexa FMV-renderingar.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['Skips videos/FMVs in games to avoid game hanging/freezes.']
trans-unit.source: Skips videos/FMVs in games to avoid game hanging/freezes.
trans-unit.target: Hoppar över videor/FMV:er i spel för att undvika att spelet hänger sig/fryser.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['Known to affect following games: Bleach Blade Battlers, Growlanser II and III, Wizardry.']
trans-unit.source: Known to affect following games: Bleach Blade Battlers, Growlanser II and III, Wizardry.
trans-unit.target: Känd för att påverka följande spel: Bleach Blade Battlers, Growlanser II och III, Wizardry.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['General-purpose timing hack. Known to affect following games: Digital Devil Saga, SSX.']
trans-unit.source: General-purpose timing hack. Known to affect following games: Digital Devil Saga, SSX.
trans-unit.target: Allmänt timing-hack. Känd för att påverka följande spel: Digital Devil Saga, SSX.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['Good for cache emulation problems. Known to affect following games: Fire Pro Wrestling Z.']
trans-unit.source: Good for cache emulation problems. Known to affect following games: Fire Pro Wrestling Z.
trans-unit.target: Bra för problem med cache-emulering. Känd för att påverka följande spel: Fire Pro Wrestling Z.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['Known to affect following games: Mana Khemia 1, Metal Saga, Pilot Down Behind Enemy Lines.']
trans-unit.source: Known to affect following games: Mana Khemia 1, Metal Saga, Pilot Down Behind Enemy Lines.
trans-unit.target: Känd för att påverka följande spel: Mana Khemia 1, Metal Saga, Pilot Down Behind Enemy Lines.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['Correct but slower. Known to affect the following games: Fifa Street 2.']
trans-unit.source: Correct but slower. Known to affect the following games: Fifa Street 2.
trans-unit.target: Korrekt men långsammare. Känd för att påverka följande spel: Fifa Street 2.
trans-unit.note: Isn't FIFA supposed to be spelt in all-caps?

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['Simulate VIF1 FIFO read ahead. Known to affect following games: Test Drive Unlimited, Transformers.']
trans-unit.source: Simulate VIF1 FIFO read ahead. Known to affect following games: Test Drive Unlimited, Transformers.
trans-unit.target: Simulerar VIF1 FIFO-läsning framåt. Känd för att påverka följande spel: Test Drive Unlimited, Transformers.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['For SOCOM 2 HUD and Spy Hunter loading hang.']
trans-unit.source: For SOCOM 2 HUD and Spy Hunter loading hang.
trans-unit.target: För inläsningshängning i SOCOM 2 HUD och Spy Hunter.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['For Tri-Ace Games: Star Ocean 3, Radiata Stories, Valkyrie Profile 2.']
trans-unit.source: For Tri-Ace Games: Star Ocean 3, Radiata Stories, Valkyrie Profile 2.
trans-unit.target: För Tri-Ace-spel: Star Ocean 3, Radiata Stories, Valkyrie Profile 2.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['Avoids constant recompilation in some games. Known to affect the following games: Scarface The World is Yours, Crash Tag Team Racing.']
trans-unit.source: Avoids constant recompilation in some games. Known to affect the following games: Scarface The World is Yours, Crash Tag Team Racing.
trans-unit.target: Undviker ständig omkompilering i vissa spel. Känd för att påverka följande spel: Scarface The World is Yours, Crash Tag Team Racing.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['Forces tight VU0 sync on every COP2 instruction.']
trans-unit.source: Forces tight VU0 sync on every COP2 instruction.
trans-unit.target: Tvingar fram en tät VU0-synkronisering vid varje COP2-instruktion.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['Run behind. To avoid sync problems when reading or writing VU registers.']
trans-unit.source: Run behind. To avoid sync problems when reading or writing VU registers.
trans-unit.target: Kör efter. För att undvika synkroniseringsproblem vid läsning eller skrivning av fordonsregister.

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['To check for possible float overflows (Superman Returns).']
trans-unit.source: To check for possible float overflows (Superman Returns).
trans-unit.target: För att kontrollera eventuella överflöden av flottörer (Superman Returns).

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['Use accurate timing for VU XGKicks (slower).']
trans-unit.source: Use accurate timing for VU XGKicks (slower).
trans-unit.target: Använd exakt timing för VU XGKicks (långsammare).

trans-unit.resname: GameFixSettingsWidget['Use alternative method to calculate internal FPS to avoid false readings in some games.']
trans-unit.source: Use alternative method to calculate internal FPS to avoid false readings in some games.
trans-unit.target: Använd en alternativ metod för att beräkna interna FPS för att undvika felaktiga avläsningar i vissa spel.

trans-unit.note: This "Other" is used in the Region indicator for the Game Properties windows.

trans-unit.resname: GamePatchSettingsWidget['Activating game patches can cause unpredictable behavior, crashing, soft-locks, or broken saved games. Use patches at your own risk, the PCSX2 team will provide no support for users who have enabled game patches.']
trans-unit.source: Activating game patches can cause unpredictable behavior, crashing, soft-locks, or broken saved games. Use patches at your own risk, the PCSX2 team will provide no support for users who have enabled game patches.
trans-unit.target: Aktivering av spelpatchar kan orsaka oförväntat beteende, krascher, låsningar eller trasiga sparade spel. Använd patchar på din egen risk, PCSX2-teamet kommer inte tillhandahålla support till användaren som har spelpatchar aktiverade.

trans-unit.resname: GamePatchSettingsWidget['Any patches bundled with PCSX2 for this game will be disabled since you have unlabeled patches loaded.']
trans-unit.source: Any patches bundled with PCSX2 for this game will be disabled since you have unlabeled patches loaded.
trans-unit.target: Alla patchar som skickas med PCSX2 för detta spel kommer att inaktiveras eftersom du har patchar utan etiketter inlästa.

trans-unit.resname: GamePatchSettingsWidget['Toggles scanning patch files for all CRCs of the game. With this enabled available patches for the game serial with different CRCs will also be loaded.']
trans-unit.source: Toggles scanning patch files for all CRCs of the game. With this enabled available patches for the game serial with different CRCs will also be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Växlar sökning efter patchfiler för alla CRCs för spelet. När aktiverad kommer tillgängliga patchar för spelets serienummer med olika CRCs också att läsas in.
trans-unit.note: 「ロードされる」とするか、「読み込まれる」とするか、過去の翻訳をみるとロードという翻訳は使っていないように思えましたので。

Shouldn't this be "display resolution"? like if you take a screenshot with this option set to "screen resolution", your screen is 1920x1080, and you're not in fullscreen, I'm pretty sure your screenshot won't be 1920x1080 🤔

Just adding a note here to double confirm that this is a Recommended Value description for the Screenshot Size hint text. Also, now that the options read "Window Resolution" and "Internal Resolution", this should be unified with the actual option names.

trans-unit.target: Fixar för manuell rendering av hårdvara

context-group.context: CLUT: Color Look Up Table, often referred to as a palette in non-PS2 things. GPU Target CLUT: GPU handling of when a game uses data from a render target as a CLUT. GraphicsSettingsWidget ../Settings/GraphicsSettingsWidget.ui:853

trans-unit.note: Needs an explanation regarding what is targeted here.

@IlDucci If i understand correctly, target here is not a verb but an adjective. You can rephrase it as "Intended CLUT by the GPU" or "GPU's desired CLUT". The string Is talking about what's the CLUT value meant by the GPU to reach/accomplish. I think an accurate translation would be "CLUT objetivo de la GPU".
It should be Half-Pixel Offset:
What does "Half" mean here (Round Sprites)?
@IlDucci it means half a pixel
@refraction Thanks.
@IlDucci Sorry I should elaborate a bit, half a pixel in distance, so I assume it rounds to the nearest 0.5, not 100% sure on that, but I assume so, with "full" being the nearest whole number

From the tooltip: "Corrects the sampling of 2D sprite textures when upscaling. Fixes lines in sprites of games like Ar tonelico when upscaling. Half option is for flat sprites, Full is for all sprites."
WebP is an image compression format. Do not translate if possible.
Is RT=Render Target or is it something else?
@DelaryWeeb yes

Inconsistent with Fullscreen? One says "Performance" and the other says "Statistics".
VPS = Vertical interrupts Per Second.
Idk why it's Container but refers to video capture format, so 'Format' sounds reasonable.

@mavethee Video recordings nowadays can be split into three different components: - The video stream, which can have a number of codecs. - The audio stream, which can have another number of codecs. - The container "format" which dictates how are the video streams and audio streams held together.
