trans-unit.note: This refers to the recommended value for each option, seen in the hint box after the text "Recommended Value:".

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Automatically loads and applies widescreen patches on game start. Can cause issues.']
trans-unit.source: Automatically loads and applies widescreen patches on game start. Can cause issues.
trans-unit.target: Läser automatiskt in och tillämpar bredbildspatchar vid speluppstart. Kan orsaka problem.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Automatically loads and applies no-interlacing patches on game start. Can cause issues.']
trans-unit.source: Automatically loads and applies no-interlacing patches on game start. Can cause issues.
trans-unit.target: Läser automatiskt in och tillämpar no-interlacing-patchar vid speluppstart. Kan orsaka problem.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Disables interlacing offset which may reduce blurring in some situations.']
trans-unit.source: Disables interlacing offset which may reduce blurring in some situations.
trans-unit.target: Avaktiverar interlacing offset som kan minska oskärpa i vissa situationer.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Enables bilinear post processing filter. Smooths the overall picture as it is displayed on the screen. Corrects positioning between pixels.']
trans-unit.source: Enables bilinear post processing filter. Smooths the overall picture as it is displayed on the screen. Corrects positioning between pixels.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverar bilinjärt efterbehandlingsfilter. Utjämnar den övergripande bilden när den visas på skärmen. Korrigerar positionering mellan pixlar.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Enables PCRTC Offsets which position the screen as the game requests. Useful for some games such as WipEout Fusion for its screen shake effect, but can make the picture blurry.']
trans-unit.source: Enables PCRTC Offsets which position the screen as the game requests. Useful for some games such as WipEout Fusion for its screen shake effect, but can make the picture blurry.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverar PCRTC Offsets som positionerar skärmen enligt spelets önskemål. Användbart för vissa spel som WipEout Fusion för dess skärmskakningseffekt, men kan göra bilden suddig.

context-group.context: PCRTC: Programmable CRT (Cathode Ray Tube) Controller. GraphicsSettingsWidget ../Settings/GraphicsSettingsWidget.cpp:487

trans-unit.note: PCRTC: Programmable CRT Controller

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Enables the option to show the overscan area on games which draw more than the safe area of the screen.']
trans-unit.source: Enables the option to show the overscan area on games which draw more than the safe area of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverar alternativet att visa overscan-området på spel som ritar mer än det säkra området på skärmen.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Determines the deinterlacing method to be used on the interlaced screen of the emulated console. Automatic should be able to correctly deinterlace most games, but if you see visibly shaky graphics, try one of the available options.']
trans-unit.source: Determines the deinterlacing method to be used on the interlaced screen of the emulated console. Automatic should be able to correctly deinterlace most games, but if you see visibly shaky graphics, try one of the available options.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer vilken deinterlacingmetod som ska användas på den emulerade konsolens interlacedskärm. Automatisk bör kunna deinterlaca de flesta spel korrekt, men om du ser skakig grafik kan du prova något av de tillgängliga alternativen.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Control the accuracy level of the GS blending unit emulation.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} The higher the setting, the more blending is emulated in the shader accurately, and the higher the speed penalty will be.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} Do note that Direct3D{[=-apos;-=]}s blending is reduced in capability compared to OpenGL/Vulkan.']
trans-unit.source: Control the accuracy level of the GS blending unit emulation.<br> The higher the setting, the more blending is emulated in the shader accurately, and the higher the speed penalty will be.<br> Do note that Direct3D's blending is reduced in capability compared to OpenGL/Vulkan.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollera noggrannhetsnivån för emuleringen av GS-blandningsenheten.<br> Ju högre inställning, desto mer exakt emuleras blandningen i shadern och desto högre blir hastighetsnedsättningen.<br> Observera att Direct3D:s blandning har sämre kapacitet jämfört med OpenGL/Vulkan.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Try to detect when a game is drawing its own color palette and then renders it on the GPU with special handling.']
trans-unit.source: Try to detect when a game is drawing its own color palette and then renders it on the GPU with special handling.
trans-unit.target: Försök att upptäcka när ett spel ritar sin egen färgpalett och renderar den sedan på GPU:n med särskild hantering.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['This option disables game-specific render fixes.']
trans-unit.source: This option disables game-specific render fixes.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['By default, the texture cache handles partial invalidations. Unfortunately it is very costly to compute CPU wise. This hack replaces the partial invalidation with a complete deletion of the texture to reduce the CPU load. It helps with the Snowblind engine games.']
trans-unit.source: By default, the texture cache handles partial invalidations. Unfortunately it is very costly to compute CPU wise. This hack replaces the partial invalidation with a complete deletion of the texture to reduce the CPU load. It helps with the Snowblind engine games.
trans-unit.target: Som standard hanterar texturcachen partiella invalideringar. Tyvärr är det mycket kostsamt att beräkna CPU-mässigt. Detta hack ersätter den partiella ogiltigförklaringen med en fullständig radering av texturen för att minska CPU-belastningen. Det hjälper till med Snowblind-motorspelen.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Convert 4-bit and 8-bit framebuffer on the CPU instead of the GPU. Helps Harry Potter and Stuntman games. It has a big impact on performance.']
trans-unit.source: Convert 4-bit and 8-bit framebuffer on the CPU instead of the GPU. Helps Harry Potter and Stuntman games. It has a big impact on performance.
trans-unit.target: Konvertera 4-bitars och 8-bitars framebuffer på CPU:n istället för GPU:n. Hjälper Harry Potter- och Stuntman-spel. Det har en stor inverkan på prestandan.

trans-unit.note: NOTE: this string is the Recommended value for the Texture Inside RT setting.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Overrides the full-motion video (FMV) aspect ratio. If disabled, the FMV Aspect Ratio will match the same value as the general Aspect Ratio setting.']
trans-unit.source: Overrides the full-motion video (FMV) aspect ratio. If disabled, the FMV Aspect Ratio will match the same value as the general Aspect Ratio setting.
trans-unit.target: Åsidosätter bildförhållandet för FMV (Full Motion Video). Om inaktiverad kommer FMV-bildförhållandet att matcha samma värde som den allmänna inställningen för bildförhållande.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Enables mipmapping, which some games require to render correctly. Mipmapping uses progressively lower resolution variants of textures at progressively further distances to reduce processing load and avoid visual artifacts.']
trans-unit.source: Enables mipmapping, which some games require to render correctly. Mipmapping uses progressively lower resolution variants of textures at progressively further distances to reduce processing load and avoid visual artifacts.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverar mipmapping, som vissa spel kräver för att återges korrekt. Mipmapping använder varianter av texturer med allt lägre upplösning på allt längre avstånd för att minska belastningen på processorn och undvika visuella artefakter.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Changes what filtering algorithm is used to map textures to surfaces.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} Nearest: Makes no attempt to blend colors.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} Bilinear (Forced): Will blend colors together to remove harsh edges between different colored pixels even if the game told the PS2 not to.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} Bilinear (PS2): Will apply filtering to all surfaces that a game instructs the PS2 to filter.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} Bilinear (Forced Excluding Sprites): Will appl
trans-unit.source: Changes what filtering algorithm is used to map textures to surfaces.<br> Nearest: Makes no attempt to blend colors.<br> Bilinear (Forced): Will blend colors together to remove harsh edges between different colored pixels even if the game told the PS2 not to.<br> Bilinear (PS2): Will apply filtering to all surfaces that a game instructs the PS2 to filter.<br> Bilinear (Forced Excluding Sprites): Will apply filtering to all surfaces, even if the game told the PS2 not to, except sprites.
trans-unit.target: Ändrar vilken filtreringsalgoritm som används för att mappa texturer till ytor.<br> Närmast: Gör inga försök att blanda färger.<br> Bilineär (tvingad): Blandar ihop färger för att ta bort hårda kanter mellan olikfärgade pixlar även om spelet sagt till PS2 att inte göra det.<br> Bilinear (PS2): Tillämpar filtrering på alla ytor som ett spel instruerar PS2 att filtrera.<br> Bilinear (Forced Excluding Sprites): Tillämpar filtrering på alla ytor, även om spelet har sagt åt PS2 att inte göra det, utom sprites.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Reduces blurriness of large textures applied to small, steeply angled surfaces by sampling colors from the two nearest Mipmaps. Requires Mipmapping to be {[=-apos;-=]}on{[=-apos;-=]}.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} Off: Disables the feature.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} Trilinear (PS2): Applies Trilinear filtering to all surfaces that a game instructs the PS2 to.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} Trilinear (Forced): Applies Trilinear filtering to all surfaces, even if the game told the PS2 not to.']
trans-unit.source: Reduces blurriness of large textures applied to small, steeply angled surfaces by sampling colors from the two nearest Mipmaps. Requires Mipmapping to be 'on'.<br> Off: Disables the feature.<br> Trilinear (PS2): Applies Trilinear filtering to all surfaces that a game instructs the PS2 to.<br> Trilinear (Forced): Applies Trilinear filtering to all surfaces, even if the game told the PS2 not to.
trans-unit.target: Minskar oskärpan i stora texturer som appliceras på små, brant vinklade ytor genom att sampla färger från de två närmaste Mipmaps. Kräver att Mipmapping är "på".<br> Av: Inaktiverar funktionen.<br> Trilinear (PS2): Tillämpar trilinjär filtrering på alla ytor som ett spel instruerar PS2 att filtrera.<br> Trilinear (Forced): Tillämpar trilinjär filtrering på alla ytor, även om spelet har sagt åt PS2 att inte göra det.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Reduces banding between colors and improves the perceived color depth.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} Off: Disables any dithering.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} Scaled: Upscaling-aware / Highest dithering effect.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} Unscaled: Native Dithering / Lowest dithering effect does not increase size of squares when upscaling.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]} Force 32bit: Treat all draws as if they were 32bit to avoid banding and dithering.']
trans-unit.source: Reduces banding between colors and improves the perceived color depth.<br> Off: Disables any dithering.<br> Scaled: Upscaling-aware / Highest dithering effect.<br> Unscaled: Native Dithering / Lowest dithering effect does not increase size of squares when upscaling.<br> Force 32bit: Treat all draws as if they were 32bit to avoid banding and dithering.
trans-unit.target: Minskar bandning mellan färger och förbättrar det upplevda färgdjupet.<br> Off: Inaktiverar all dithering.<br> Scaled: Medveten om uppskalning / Högsta dithering-effekt.<br> Oskalat: Native Dithering / Lägsta dithering-effekt ökar inte storleken på rutor vid uppskalning.<br> Force 32bit: Behandla alla ritningar som om de vore 32bit för att undvika banding och dithering.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Does useless work on the CPU during readbacks to prevent it from going to into powersave modes. May improve performance during readbacks but with a significant increase in power usage.']
trans-unit.source: Does useless work on the CPU during readbacks to prevent it from going to into powersave modes. May improve performance during readbacks but with a significant increase in power usage.
trans-unit.target: Utför värdelöst arbete på processorn under återläsningar för att förhindra att den går in i energisparläge. Kan förbättra prestandan under återläsningar men med en betydande ökning av strömförbrukningen.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Submits useless work to the GPU during readbacks to prevent it from going into powersave modes. May improve performance during readbacks but with a significant increase in power usage.']
trans-unit.source: Submits useless work to the GPU during readbacks to prevent it from going into powersave modes. May improve performance during readbacks but with a significant increase in power usage.
trans-unit.target: Överlämnar värdelöst arbete till GPU:n under återläsningar för att förhindra att den går in i energisparläge. Kan förbättra prestandan under återläsningar men med en betydande ökning av strömförbrukningen.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Number of rendering threads: 0 for single thread, 2 or more for multithread (1 is for debugging). 2 to 4 threads is recommended, any more than that is likely to be slower instead of faster.']
trans-unit.source: Number of rendering threads: 0 for single thread, 2 or more for multithread (1 is for debugging). 2 to 4 threads is recommended, any more than that is likely to be slower instead of faster.
trans-unit.target: Antal renderingstrådar: 0 för enstaka trådar, 2 eller fler för flera trådar (1 är för felsökning). 2 till 4 trådar rekommenderas, fler än så kommer sannolikt att vara långsammare istället för snabbare.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Disable the support of depth buffers in the texture cache. Will likely create various glitches and is only useful for debugging.']
trans-unit.source: Disable the support of depth buffers in the texture cache. Will likely create various glitches and is only useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: Avaktivera stöd för djupbuffertar i texturcachen. Kommer troligen att skapa olika problem och är endast användbart för felsökning.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Allows the texture cache to reuse as an input texture the inner portion of a previous framebuffer.']
trans-unit.source: Allows the texture cache to reuse as an input texture the inner portion of a previous framebuffer.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter texturcachen att återanvända den inre delen av en tidigare framebuffer som en inmatningstextur.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Flushes all targets in the texture cache back to local memory when shutting down. Can prevent lost visuals when saving state or switching renderers, but can also cause graphical corruption.']
trans-unit.source: Flushes all targets in the texture cache back to local memory when shutting down. Can prevent lost visuals when saving state or switching renderers, but can also cause graphical corruption.
trans-unit.target: Rensar alla mål i texturcachen tillbaka till lokalminnet när systemet stängs ned. Kan förhindra förlorade bilder när du sparar tillstånd eller byter renderare, men kan också orsaka grafisk korruption.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Attempts to reduce the texture size when games do not set it themselves (e.g. Snowblind games).']
trans-unit.source: Attempts to reduce the texture size when games do not set it themselves (e.g. Snowblind games).
trans-unit.target: Försök att minska texturstorleken när spelen inte ställer in den själva (t.ex. Snowblind-spel).
trans-unit.note: Specify that the Snowblind graphics engine is used, it's clearer in the translations.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Fixes issues with upscaling (vertical lines) in Namco games like Ace Combat, Tekken, Soul Calibur, etc.']
trans-unit.source: Fixes issues with upscaling (vertical lines) in Namco games like Ace Combat, Tekken, Soul Calibur, etc.
trans-unit.target: Åtgärdar problem med uppskalning (vertikala linjer) i Namco-spel som Ace Combat, Tekken, Soul Calibur, etc.

context-group.context: Namco: a game publisher and development company. Leave the name as-is. Ace Combat, Tekken, Soul Calibur: game names. Leave as-is or use official translations. GraphicsSettingsWidget ../Settings/GraphicsSettingsWidget.cpp:695

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Dumps replaceable textures to disk. Will reduce performance.']
trans-unit.source: Dumps replaceable textures to disk. Will reduce performance.
trans-unit.target: Dumpar ersättningsbara texturer till disk. Kommer att minska prestandan.
Inkluderar mipmaps vid dumpning av texturer.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Allows texture dumping when FMVs are active. You should not enable this.']
trans-unit.source: Allows texture dumping when FMVs are active. You should not enable this.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter texturdumpning när FMV är aktiv. Du bör inte aktivera detta.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Loads replacement textures on a worker thread, reducing microstutter when replacements are enabled.']
trans-unit.source: Loads replacement textures on a worker thread, reducing microstutter when replacements are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Läser in ersättningstexturer på en arbetstråd, vilket minskar mikrostutter när ersättningar är aktiverade.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Loads replacement textures where available and user-provided.']
trans-unit.source: Loads replacement textures where available and user-provided.
trans-unit.target: Läser in ersättningstexturer som finns tillgängliga och tillhandahållna av användaren.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Preloads all replacement textures to memory. Not necessary with asynchronous loading.']
trans-unit.source: Preloads all replacement textures to memory. Not necessary with asynchronous loading.
trans-unit.target: Förinläser alla ersättningstexturer till minnet. Behövs inte med asynkron inläsning.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Determines the intensity the sharpening effect in CAS post-processing.']
trans-unit.source: Determines the intensity the sharpening effect in CAS post-processing.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer intensiteten på skärpeeffekten i CAS efterbehandling.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Scales the size of the onscreen OSD from 50% to 500%.']
trans-unit.source: Scales the size of the onscreen OSD from 50% to 500%.
trans-unit.target: Skalar storleken på skärmens OSD från 50% till 500%.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Shows a variety of on-screen performance data points as selected by the user.']
trans-unit.source: Shows a variety of on-screen performance data points as selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Visar en mängd olika datapunkter på skärmen som valts av användaren.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Shows the vsync rate of the emulator in the top-right corner of the display.']
trans-unit.source: Shows the vsync rate of the emulator in the top-right corner of the display.
trans-unit.target: Visar emulatorns vsync-frekvens i det övre högra hörnet av displayen.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Shows OSD icon indicators for emulation states such as Pausing, Turbo, Fast-Forward, and Slow-Motion.']
trans-unit.source: Shows OSD icon indicators for emulation states such as Pausing, Turbo, Fast-Forward, and Slow-Motion.
trans-unit.target: Visar OSD-ikonindikatorer för emuleringstillstånd som paus, turbo, snabbspolning framåt och slowmotion.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Displays various settings and the current values of those settings, useful for debugging.']
trans-unit.source: Displays various settings and the current values of those settings, useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: Visar olika inställningar och aktuella värden för dessa inställningar, användbart för felsökning.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Displays a graph showing the average frametimes.']
trans-unit.source: Displays a graph showing the average frametimes.
trans-unit.target: Visar en graf över genomsnittliga bildrutetider.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Shows the current system hardware information on the OSD.']
trans-unit.source: Shows the current system hardware information on the OSD.
trans-unit.target: Visar aktuell information om systemets hårdvara i OSD.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Selects which Video Codec to be used for Video Capture. {[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}If unsure, leave it on default.{[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}']
trans-unit.source: Selects which Video Codec to be used for Video Capture. <b>If unsure, leave it on default.<b>
trans-unit.target: Väljer vilken videokodek som ska användas för videoinspelning. <b>Om du är osäker, låt den vara kvar som standard.<b>

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Selects which Video Format to be used for Video Capture. If by chance the codec does not support the format, the first format available will be used. {[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}If unsure, leave it on default.{[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}']
trans-unit.source: Selects which Video Format to be used for Video Capture. If by chance the codec does not support the format, the first format available will be used. <b>If unsure, leave it on default.<b>
trans-unit.target: Väljer vilket videoformat som ska användas för videoinspelning. Om codec av en slump inte stöder formatet kommer det första tillgängliga formatet att användas. Om du är osäker, lämna det som standard;

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Sets the video bitrate to be used. Larger bitrate generally yields better video quality at the cost of larger resulting file size.']
trans-unit.source: Sets the video bitrate to be used. Larger bitrate generally yields better video quality at the cost of larger resulting file size.
trans-unit.target: Ställer in den videobitrate som ska användas. Högre bithastighet ger i allmänhet bättre videokvalitet till priset av större filstorlek.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['When checked, the video capture resolution will follows the internal resolution of the running game.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}Be careful when using this setting especially when you are upscaling, as higher internal resolution (above 4x) can results in very large video capture and can cause system overload.{[=-lt;-=]}/b{[=-gt;-=]}']
trans-unit.source: When checked, the video capture resolution will follows the internal resolution of the running game.<br><br><b>Be careful when using this setting especially when you are upscaling, as higher internal resolution (above 4x) can results in very large video capture and can cause system overload.</b>
trans-unit.target: När den är markerad följer videoinspelningens upplösning det pågående spelets interna upplösning.<br><br><b>Var försiktig när du använder den här inställningen, särskilt när du uppskalar, eftersom högre intern upplösning (över 4x) kan resultera i mycket stor videoinspelning och kan orsaka överbelastning av systemet.</b>
trans-unit.note: ...will follows...? ...can results...?

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Allows you to pass arguments to the selected video codec.']
trans-unit.source: Allows you to pass arguments to the selected video codec.
trans-unit.target: Gör det möjligt att skicka argument till den valda videokodeken.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Selects which Audio Codec to be used for Video Capture. {[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}If unsure, leave it on default.{[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}']
trans-unit.source: Selects which Audio Codec to be used for Video Capture. <b>If unsure, leave it on default.<b>
trans-unit.target: Väljer vilken ljudkodek som ska användas för videoinspelning. <b>Om du är osäker, låt den vara kvar som standard.<b>

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Allows you to pass arguments to the selected audio codec.']
trans-unit.source: Allows you to pass arguments to the selected audio codec.
trans-unit.target: Gör det möjligt att skicka argument till den valda ljudkodeken.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Overrides the driver{[=-apos;-=]}s heuristics for enabling exclusive fullscreen, or direct flip/scanout.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]}Disallowing exclusive fullscreen may enable smoother task switching and overlays, but increase input latency.']
trans-unit.source: Overrides the driver's heuristics for enabling exclusive fullscreen, or direct flip/scanout.<br>Disallowing exclusive fullscreen may enable smoother task switching and overlays, but increase input latency.
trans-unit.target: Åsidosätter drivrutinens heuristik för aktivering av exklusiv helskärm eller direkt flip/scanout.<br>Om du inte tillåter exklusiv helskärm kan det möjliggöra smidigare uppgiftsväxling och överlägg, men öka inmatningslatensen.

trans-unit.note: Crowdin's acting funny with the variable %1: If your language requires a different character than an x or a different position, please prioritize your language while not forgetting to add the "%1" variable.
This refers to the recommended value for each option, seen in the hint box after the text "Recommended Value:".

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Enables internal Anti-Blur hacks. Less accurate to PS2 rendering but will make a lot of games look less blurry.']
trans-unit.source: Enables internal Anti-Blur hacks. Less accurate to PS2 rendering but will make a lot of games look less blurry.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverar interna Anti-Blur-hack. Inte lika exakt som PS2-renderingen, men gör att många spel ser mindre suddiga ut.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Adds padding to the display area to ensure that the ratio between pixels on the host to pixels in the console is an integer number. May result in a sharper image in some 2D games.']
trans-unit.source: Adds padding to the display area to ensure that the ratio between pixels on the host to pixels in the console is an integer number. May result in a sharper image in some 2D games.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till utfyllnad i visningsområdet för att säkerställa att förhållandet mellan pixlar på värden och pixlar i konsolen är ett heltal. Kan resultera i en skarpare bild i vissa 2D-spel.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Changes the aspect ratio used to display the console{[=-apos;-=]}s output to the screen. The default is Auto Standard (4:3/3:2 Progressive) which automatically adjusts the aspect ratio to match how a game would be shown on a typical TV of the era.']
trans-unit.source: Changes the aspect ratio used to display the console's output to the screen. The default is Auto Standard (4:3/3:2 Progressive) which automatically adjusts the aspect ratio to match how a game would be shown on a typical TV of the era.
trans-unit.target: Ändrar det bildförhållande som används för att visa konsolens utdata på skärmen. Standardinställningen är Auto Standard (4:3/3:2 Progressive) som automatiskt justerar bildförhållandet så att det motsvarar hur ett spel skulle visas på en typisk TV för den tiden.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Determines the resolution at which screenshots will be saved. Internal resolutions preserve more detail at the cost of file size.']
trans-unit.source: Determines the resolution at which screenshots will be saved. Internal resolutions preserve more detail at the cost of file size.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer vilken upplösning som skärmdumparna ska sparas med. Interna upplösningar bevarar fler detaljer på bekostnad av filstorleken.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Selects the format which will be used to save screenshots. JPEG produces smaller files, but loses detail.']
trans-unit.source: Selects the format which will be used to save screenshots. JPEG produces smaller files, but loses detail.
trans-unit.target: Väljer det format som ska användas för att spara skärmdumpar. JPEG ger mindre filer, men förlorar detaljer.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Selects the quality at which screenshots will be compressed. Higher values preserve more detail for JPEG, and reduce file size for PNG.']
trans-unit.source: Selects the quality at which screenshots will be compressed. Higher values preserve more detail for JPEG, and reduce file size for PNG.
trans-unit.target: Väljer den kvalitet med vilken skärmdumpar komprimeras. Högre värden bevarar fler detaljer för JPEG och minskar filstorleken för PNG.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Stretches ({[=-amp;lt;-=]} 100%) or squashes ({[=-amp;gt;-=]} 100%) the vertical component of the display.']
trans-unit.source: Stretches (&lt; 100%) or squashes (&gt; 100%) the vertical component of the display.
trans-unit.target: Stretchar (&lt; 100%) eller krossar (&gt; 100%) den vertikala komponenten i displayen.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Chooses the fullscreen resolution and frequency.']
trans-unit.source: Chooses the fullscreen resolution and frequency.
trans-unit.target: Väljer upplösning och frekvens för helskärm.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Changes the number of pixels cropped from the left side of the display.']
trans-unit.source: Changes the number of pixels cropped from the left side of the display.
trans-unit.target: Ändrar antalet pixlar som beskärs från skärmens vänstra sida.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Changes the number of pixels cropped from the top of the display.']
trans-unit.source: Changes the number of pixels cropped from the top of the display.
trans-unit.target: Ändrar antalet pixlar som beskärs från skärmens övre del.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Changes the number of pixels cropped from the right side of the display.']
trans-unit.source: Changes the number of pixels cropped from the right side of the display.
trans-unit.target: Ändrar antalet pixlar som beskärs från skärmens högra sida.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Changes the number of pixels cropped from the bottom of the display.']
trans-unit.source: Changes the number of pixels cropped from the bottom of the display.
trans-unit.target: Ändrar antalet pixlar som beskärs från skärmens nedre del.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Control the resolution at which games are rendered. High resolutions can impact performance on older or lower-end GPUs.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]}Non-native resolution may cause minor graphical issues in some games.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]}FMV resolution will remain unchanged, as the video files are pre-rendered.']
trans-unit.source: Control the resolution at which games are rendered. High resolutions can impact performance on older or lower-end GPUs.<br>Non-native resolution may cause minor graphical issues in some games.<br>FMV resolution will remain unchanged, as the video files are pre-rendered.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollera den upplösning som spelen renderas med. Höga upplösningar kan påverka prestandan på äldre eller mindre avancerade GPU:er.<br>Icke-originalupplösning kan orsaka mindre grafiska problem i vissa spel.<br>FMV-upplösning förblir oförändrad, eftersom videofilerna är förrenderade.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Reduces texture aliasing at extreme viewing angles.']
trans-unit.source: Reduces texture aliasing at extreme viewing angles.
trans-unit.note: If i'm getting this correctly, Aliasing here doesn't refer to the jagged diagonal lines in rendering but the more general meaning of aliasing in computer graphics (see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aliasing ). Is "texture aliasing" here talking about spatial aliasing, a.k.a. "moiré pattern", specifically or also about other aliasing artifacts?
@TSnatch72 That is correct, this isn't "dientes de sierra" of pixels from geometry not being smoothed. I'm still looking if there is a proper translation (if exists) of this type of aliasing.

@TSnatch72 I got another answer that might suit the needs: "escalonamiento", by Microsoft: https://msit.powerbi.com/view?r=eyJrIjoiODJmYjU4Y2YtM2M0ZC00YzYxLWE1YTktNzFjYmYxNTAxNjQ0IiwidCI6IjcyZjk4OGJmLTg2ZjEtNDFhZi05MWFiLTJkN2NkMDExZGI0NyIsImMiOjV9&disablecdnExpiration=1701135746

@IlDucci Yes, it's exactly because this is the description of Anisotropic filtering that i chose to use "spatial aliasing" instead, as that's a broad term for aliasing in static images. We could also set it as "moiré patter" as that's what happen when you reproduce an image at an insufficiently lower resolution for it's sample rate, which is what you do when you render a texture at an extreme viewing angle, but texture filtering also handles the sawtooth effect in textures, so i think "spatial aliasing" or just "aliasing" works better as it covers everything the filtering does. "Escalonamiento" sounds like it's referring to sawtooth geometry, though.

@TSnatch72 I'm going to surrender to the evidence and write "aliasing" as a loanword... but adding some context in parentheses for people who might think aliasing is only for geometry edges. What do you think?

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Uploads entire textures at once instead of small pieces, avoiding redundant uploads when possible. Improves performance in most games, but can make a small selection slower.']
trans-unit.source: Uploads entire textures at once instead of small pieces, avoiding redundant uploads when possible. Improves performance in most games, but can make a small selection slower.
trans-unit.target: Laddar upp hela texturer på en gång istället för små bitar, vilket undviker överflödiga uppladdningar när det är möjligt. Förbättrar prestandan i de flesta spel, men kan göra ett litet urval långsammare.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['When enabled GPU converts colormap-textures, otherwise the CPU will. It is a trade-off between GPU and CPU.']
trans-unit.source: When enabled GPU converts colormap-textures, otherwise the CPU will. It is a trade-off between GPU and CPU.
trans-unit.target: När det är aktiverat konverterar GPU colormap-texturer, annars gör CPU det. Det är en avvägning mellan GPU och CPU.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Enabling this option gives you the ability to change the renderer and upscaling fixes to your games. However IF you have ENABLED this, you WILL DISABLE AUTOMATIC SETTINGS and you can re-enable automatic settings by unchecking this option.']
trans-unit.source: Enabling this option gives you the ability to change the renderer and upscaling fixes to your games. However IF you have ENABLED this, you WILL DISABLE AUTOMATIC SETTINGS and you can re-enable automatic settings by unchecking this option.
trans-unit.target: Om du aktiverar det här alternativet får du möjlighet att ändra renderings- och uppskalningsfixarna för dina spel. Men OM du har aktiverat detta kommer du att inaktivera automatiska inställningar och du kan återaktivera automatiska inställningar genom att avmarkera det här alternativet.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Force a primitive flush when a framebuffer is also an input texture. Fixes some processing effects such as the shadows in the Jak series and radiosity in GTA:SA.']
trans-unit.source: Force a primitive flush when a framebuffer is also an input texture. Fixes some processing effects such as the shadows in the Jak series and radiosity in GTA:SA.
trans-unit.target: Tvingar fram en primitiv flush när en framebuffer också är en inmatningstextur. Fixar vissa bearbetningseffekter, t.ex. skuggorna i Jak-serien och radiosity i GTA:SA.
trans-unit.note: Context mentioned in Discord: Guessing it's primitives being flushed, but I'd want to see context / file to confirm On a real GS, primitives are drawn as they're received, but modern GPUs like big lists of primitives, so we collect primitives in a buffer until the game does something like change draw settings that forces us to finish the list, encode a draw call, and start a new buffer (which we call "flushing").

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Enables mipmapping, which some games require to render correctly.']
trans-unit.source: Enables mipmapping, which some games require to render correctly.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverar mipmapping, som vissa spel kräver för att återges korrekt.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['The maximum target memory width that will allow the CPU Sprite Renderer to activate on.']
trans-unit.source: The maximum target memory width that will allow the CPU Sprite Renderer to activate on.
trans-unit.target: Den maximala målminnesbredden som CPU Sprite Renderer kan aktiveras på.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Tries to detect when a game is drawing its own color palette and then renders it in software, instead of on the GPU.']
trans-unit.source: Tries to detect when a game is drawing its own color palette and then renders it in software, instead of on the GPU.
trans-unit.target: Försöker upptäcka när ett spel ritar sin egen färgpalett och renderar den sedan i programvara istället för på GPU:n.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Completely skips drawing surfaces from the surface in the left box up to the surface specified in the box on the right.']
trans-unit.source: Completely skips drawing surfaces from the surface in the left box up to the surface specified in the box on the right.
trans-unit.target: Hoppar helt över att rita ytor från ytan i den vänstra rutan upp till den yta som anges i rutan till höger.

trans-unit.note: Is this line missing a space between "Skipdraw"?

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['This option disables multiple safe features. Disables accurate Unscale Point and Line rendering which can help Xenosaga games. Disables accurate GS Memory Clearing to be done on the CPU, and let the GPU handle it, which can help Kingdom Hearts games.']
trans-unit.source: This option disables multiple safe features. Disables accurate Unscale Point and Line rendering which can help Xenosaga games. Disables accurate GS Memory Clearing to be done on the CPU, and let the GPU handle it, which can help Kingdom Hearts games.
trans-unit.target: Detta alternativ inaktiverar flera säkra funktioner. Inaktiverar exakt rendering av punkter och linjer utan skalning, vilket kan hjälpa Xenosaga-spel. Inaktiverar noggrann GS Memory Clearing som ska göras på CPU och låta GPU hantera det, vilket kan hjälpa Kingdom Hearts-spel.
trans-unit.note: @TSnatch72 There's no need to put both features in quotes, as they do not exist as single options that can be set by the user.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Uploads GS data when rendering a new frame to reproduce some effects accurately.']
trans-unit.source: Uploads GS data when rendering a new frame to reproduce some effects accurately.
trans-unit.target: Laddar upp GS-data vid rendering av en ny bildruta för att återge vissa effekter korrekt.

trans-unit.note: It should be Half-Pixel Offset

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Might fix some misaligned fog, bloom, or blend effect.']
trans-unit.source: Might fix some misaligned fog, bloom, or blend effect.
trans-unit.target: Kan fixa en feljusterad dim-, blom- eller blandningseffekt.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Corrects the sampling of 2D sprite textures when upscaling. Fixes lines in sprites of games like Ar tonelico when upscaling. Half option is for flat sprites, Full is for all sprites.']
trans-unit.source: Corrects the sampling of 2D sprite textures when upscaling. Fixes lines in sprites of games like Ar tonelico when upscaling. Half option is for flat sprites, Full is for all sprites.
trans-unit.target: Korrigerar samplingen av 2D-sprite-texturer vid uppskalning. Fixar linjer i sprites i spel som Ar tonelico vid uppskalning. Alternativet Half är för platta sprites, Full är för alla sprites.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Offset for the ST/UV texture coordinates. Fixes some odd texture issues and might fix some post processing alignment too.']
trans-unit.source: Offset for the ST/UV texture coordinates. Fixes some odd texture issues and might fix some post processing alignment too.
trans-unit.target: Offset för ST/UV-texturkoordinaterna. Fixar en del udda texturproblem och kan även fixa en del efterbearbetningsjustering.

context-group.context: ST and UV are different types of texture coordinates, like XY would be spatial coordinates. GraphicsSettingsWidget ../Settings/GraphicsSettingsWidget.cpp:685 ../Settings/GraphicsSettingsWidget.cpp:690

trans-unit.note: S / T / U / V are all types of texture coordinates, like X and Y would be spatial coordinates.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Lowers the GS precision to avoid gaps between pixels when upscaling. Fixes the text on Wild Arms games.']
trans-unit.source: Lowers the GS precision to avoid gaps between pixels when upscaling. Fixes the text on Wild Arms games.
trans-unit.target: Sänker GS-precisionen för att undvika luckor mellan pixlar vid uppskalning. Fixar texten på Wild Arms-spel.

context-group.context: Wild Arms: name of a game series. Leave as-is or use an official translation. GraphicsSettingsWidget ../Settings/GraphicsSettingsWidget.cpp:699

trans-unit.note: option says bilinear dirty, while tooltip just says bilinear
@nikivarvar I agree, this needs clarification/unification.

trans-unit.source: Applies a shader which replicates the visual effects of different styles of television set.
trans-unit.target: Använder en shader som återskapar de visuella effekterna av olika typer av TV-apparater.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Shows on-screen-display messages when events occur such as save states being created/loaded, screenshots being taken, etc.']
trans-unit.source: Shows on-screen-display messages when events occur such as save states being created/loaded, screenshots being taken, etc.

trans-unit.source: Shows the internal frame rate of the game in the top-right corner of the display.

trans-unit.source: Shows the currently active video capture status.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Shows the currently active input recording status.']
trans-unit.source: Shows the currently active input recording status.

trans-unit.source: Displays warnings when settings are enabled which may break games.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Change the compression algorithm used when creating a GS dump.']
trans-unit.source: Change the compression algorithm used when creating a GS dump.
trans-unit.target: Ändra den komprimeringsalgoritm som används när en GS-dump skapas.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Uses a blit presentation model instead of flipping when using the Direct3D 11 renderer. This usually results in slower performance, but may be required for some streaming applications, or to uncap framerates on some systems.']
trans-unit.source: Uses a blit presentation model instead of flipping when using the Direct3D 11 renderer. This usually results in slower performance, but may be required for some streaming applications, or to uncap framerates on some systems.
trans-unit.target: Använder en blit-presentationsmodell istället för flipping när Direct3D 11-renderaren används. Detta resulterar vanligtvis i långsammare prestanda, men kan vara nödvändigt för vissa streamingapplikationer eller för att frigöra framerates på vissa system.

context-group.context: Blit = a data operation. You might want to write it as-is, but fully uppercased. More information: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bit_blit GraphicsSettingsWidget ../Settings/GraphicsSettingsWidget.cpp:856

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Detects when idle frames are being presented in 25/30fps games, and skips presenting those frames. The frame is still rendered, it just means the GPU has more time to complete it (this is NOT frame skipping). Can smooth out frame time fluctuations when the CPU/GPU are near maximum utilization, but makes frame pacing more inconsistent and can increase input lag.']
trans-unit.source: Detects when idle frames are being presented in 25/30fps games, and skips presenting those frames. The frame is still rendered, it just means the GPU has more time to complete it (this is NOT frame skipping). Can smooth out frame time fluctuations when the CPU/GPU are near maximum utilization, but makes frame pacing more inconsistent and can increase input lag.
trans-unit.target: Upptäcker när inaktiva bildrutor presenteras i 25/30 fps-spel och hoppar över att presentera dessa bildrutor. Bildrutan renderas fortfarande, det betyder bara att GPU:n har mer tid på sig att slutföra den (detta är INTE bildruteskippning). Kan jämna ut fluktuationer i bildtid när CPU/GPU är nära maximalt utnyttjande, men gör bildhastigheten mer inkonsekvent och kan öka input lag.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Displays additional, very high upscaling multipliers dependent on GPU capability.']
trans-unit.source: Displays additional, very high upscaling multipliers dependent on GPU capability.
trans-unit.target: Visar ytterligare, mycket höga uppskalningsmultiplikatorer beroende på GPU-kapacitet.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Enables API-level validation of graphics commands.']
trans-unit.source: Enables API-level validation of graphics commands.
trans-unit.target: Möjliggör validering av grafikkommandon på API-nivå.

trans-unit.resname: GraphicsSettingsWidget['Skips synchronizing with the GS thread and host GPU for GS downloads. Can result in a large speed boost on slower systems, at the cost of many broken graphical effects. If games are broken and you have this option enabled, please disable it first.']
trans-unit.source: Skips synchronizing with the GS thread and host GPU for GS downloads. Can result in a large speed boost on slower systems, at the cost of many broken graphical effects. If games are broken and you have this option enabled, please disable it first.
trans-unit.target: Hoppar över synkroniseringen med GS-tråden och värd-GPU:n för GS-hämtningar. Kan resultera i en stor hastighetsökning på långsammare system, på bekostnad av många trasiga grafiska effekter. Om spel är trasiga och du har det här alternativet aktiverat, inaktivera det först.

{} = REC icon (large circle). Do not move its position relative to the text.

This should probably not be made available for translation as-is. In my opinion, date/time strings should not be translated by us, but instead should be handled by an internationalization library such as ICU or Boost Locale.

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Automatically checks for updates to the program on startup. Updates can be deferred until later or skipped entirely.']
trans-unit.source: Automatically checks for updates to the program on startup. Updates can be deferred until later or skipped entirely.

trans-unit.note: Strings for the current beta version.

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Prevents the screen saver from activating and the host from sleeping while emulation is running.']
trans-unit.source: Prevents the screen saver from activating and the host from sleeping while emulation is running.
trans-unit.target: Förhindrar att skärmsläckaren aktiveras och att värddatorn somnar när emuleringen körs.

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Determines whether a prompt will be displayed to confirm shutting down the virtual machine when the hotkey is pressed.']
trans-unit.source: Determines whether a prompt will be displayed to confirm shutting down the virtual machine when the hotkey is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer huruvida en prompt ska visas för att bekräfta avstängning av den virtuella maskinen när snabbtangenten trycks ner.

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Pauses the emulator when a controller with bindings is disconnected.']
trans-unit.source: Pauses the emulator when a controller with bindings is disconnected.
trans-unit.target: Pausar emulatorn när en handkontroller med bindningar kopplas från.

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Allows switching in and out of fullscreen mode by double-clicking the game window.']
trans-unit.source: Allows switching in and out of fullscreen mode by double-clicking the game window.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter att växla in och ut ur helskärmsläge genom att dubbelklicka i spelfönstret.

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Prevents the main window from being resized.']
trans-unit.source: Prevents the main window from being resized.

trans-unit.note: This refers to the recommended value for each option, seen in the hint box after the text "Recommended Value:".

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Pauses the emulator when a game is started.']
trans-unit.source: Pauses the emulator when a game is started.
trans-unit.target: Pausar emulatorn när ett spel startas.

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Pauses the emulator when you minimize the window or switch to another application, and unpauses when you switch back.']
trans-unit.source: Pauses the emulator when you minimize the window or switch to another application, and unpauses when you switch back.
trans-unit.target: Pausar emulatorn när du minimerar fönstret eller växlar till ett annat program och avpausar när du växlar tillbaka.

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Automatically switches to fullscreen mode when a game is started.']
trans-unit.source: Automatically switches to fullscreen mode when a game is started.
trans-unit.target: Ändrar automatiskt till fullskärm när spelet startar.

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Hides the mouse pointer/cursor when the emulator is in fullscreen mode.']
trans-unit.source: Hides the mouse pointer/cursor when the emulator is in fullscreen mode.
trans-unit.target: Döljer muspekaren/markören när emulatorn är i helskärmsläge.

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Renders the game to a separate window, instead of the main window. If unchecked, the game will display over the top of the game list.']
trans-unit.source: Renders the game to a separate window, instead of the main window. If unchecked, the game will display over the top of the game list.
trans-unit.target: Renderar spelet till ett separat fönster istället för huvudfönstret. Om inte markerad kommer spelet att visas över spellistan.
trans-unit.note: I couldn't translate "renders" to Turkish, so went with "displays" there.

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Hides the main window (with the game list) when a game is running, requires Render To Separate Window to be enabled.']
trans-unit.source: Hides the main window (with the game list) when a game is running, requires Render To Separate Window to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: Döljer huvudfönstret (med spellistan) när ett spel körs. Kräver att Rendera till separat fönster är aktiverat.

trans-unit.resname: InterfaceSettingsWidget['Shows the game you are currently playing as part of your profile in Discord.']
trans-unit.source: Shows the game you are currently playing as part of your profile in Discord.
trans-unit.target: Visar spelet som du för närvarande spelar som en del av din profil på Discord.

trans-unit.note: Ignore Crowdin's mention that "[Default]" should not be translated, it definitely should.

trans-unit.resname:
MainWindow['Changing advanced settings can have unpredictable effects on games, including graphical glitches, lock-ups, and even corrupted save files. We do not recommend changing advanced settings unless you know what you are doing, and the implications of changing each setting.
The PCSX2 team will not provide any support for configurations that modify these settings, you are on your own.
Are you sure you want to continue?']
trans-unit.source:
Changing advanced settings can have unpredictable effects on games, including graphical glitches, lock-ups, and even corrupted save files. We do not recommend changing advanced settings unless you know what you are doing, and the implications of changing each setting.
The PCSX2 team will not provide any support for configurations that modify these settings, you are on your own.
Are you sure you want to continue?
trans-unit.target:
Ändringar av avancerade inställningar kan ha oförväntade effekter på spel, inklusive grafiska problem, låsningar och även skadade sparade filer. Vil rekommenderar inte att ändra avancerade inställningar såvida inte du vet vad du gör och implikationerna av att ändra varje inställning.
PCSX2-teamet kommer inte att ge support för konfigurationer som ändrar dessa inställningar. Du gör det på egen risk.
Är du säker på att du vill fortsätta?

trans-unit.note:
Need to find out where is this used.
EDIT: Seems to be used for video captures?! Still don't know what the %1 contains.

trans-unit.resname: MainWindow['Are you sure you want to shut down the virtual machine?']
trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to shut down the virtual machine?
trans-unit.target: Är du säker på att du vill stänga av den virtuella maskinen?

trans-unit.resname: MainWindow['You must select a disc to change discs.']
trans-unit.source: You must select a disc to change discs.
trans-unit.target: Du måste välja en skiva för att byta skivor.

trans-unit.resname: MainWindow['{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}Sorry, you are trying to update a PCSX2 version which is not an official GitHub release. To prevent incompatibilities, the auto-updater is only enabled on official builds.{[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}To obtain an official build, please download from the link below:{[=-lt;-=]}/p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}p{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}a href={[=-quot;-=]}https://pcsx2.net/downloads/{[=-quot;-=]}{[=-gt;-=]}https://pcsx2.net/downloads/{[=-lt;-=]}/a{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}/
trans-unit.source: <p>Sorry, you are trying to update a PCSX2 version which is not an official GitHub release. To prevent incompatibilities, the auto-updater is only enabled on official builds.</p><p>To obtain an official build, please download from the link below:</p><p><a href="https://pcsx2.net/downloads/">https://pcsx2.net/downloads/</a></p>
trans-unit.target: <p>Tuvärr, du försöker att uppdatera en PCSX2-version som inte är en officiell GitHub-utgåva. Den automatiska uppdateraren är endast aktiverad för officiella byggversioner för att förhindra inkompatibiltet.</p><p>Hämta en officiell byggversion på länken nedan:</p><p><a href="https://pcsx2.net/downloads/">https://pcsx2.net/downloads/</a></p>

Shutting down now {[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}WILL IRREVERSIBLY DESTROY YOUR MEMORY CARD.{[=-lt;-=]}/b{[=-gt;-=]} It is strongly recommended to resume your game and let it finish writing to your memory card.{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]}{[=-lt;-=]}br{[=-gt;-=]}Do you wish to shutdown anyways and {[=-lt;-=]}b{[=-gt;-=]}IRREVERSIBLY DESTROY YOUR MEMORY CARD?{[=-lt;-=]}/b{[=-gt;-=]}']

Shutting down now <b>WILL IRREVERSIBLY DESTROY YOUR MEMORY CARD.</b> It is strongly recommended to resume your game and let it finish writing to your memory card.<br><br>Do you wish to shutdown anyways and <b>IRREVERSIBLY DESTROY YOUR MEMORY CARD?</b>

trans-unit.resname: MemoryCardConvertDialog['Your folder Memory Card has too much data inside it to be converted to a file Memory Card. The largest supported file Memory Card has a capacity of 64 MB. To convert your folder Memory Card, you must remove game folders until its size is 64 MB or less.']
trans-unit.source: Your folder Memory Card has too much data inside it to be converted to a file Memory Card. The largest supported file Memory Card has a capacity of 64 MB. To convert your folder Memory Card, you must remove game folders until its size is 64 MB or less.
trans-unit.target: Din mapp för minneskort innehåller för mycket data för att konverteras till ett minneskort på fil. Största filstorleken för ett minneskort är 64 MB. För att konvertera din mapp för minneskort så måste du ta bort spelmappar till dess storlek är 64 MB eller mindre.

trans-unit.resname: MemoryCardCreateDialog['This is the standard Sony-provisioned size, and is supported by all games and BIOS versions.']
trans-unit.source: This is the standard Sony-provisioned size, and is supported by all games and BIOS versions.
trans-unit.target: Detta är standardstorleken för Sonys egna kort och stöds av alla spel och BIOS-versioner.

trans-unit.resname: MemoryCardCreateDialog['A typical size for third-party Memory Cards which should work with most games.']
trans-unit.source: A typical size for third-party Memory Cards which should work with most games.
trans-unit.target: En vanlig storlek för minneskort från tredjepart som bör fungera med de flesta spel.

trans-unit.resname: MemoryCardCreateDialog['NTFS compression is built-in, fast, and completely reliable. Typically compresses Memory Cards (highly recommended).']
trans-unit.source: NTFS compression is built-in, fast, and completely reliable. Typically compresses Memory Cards (highly recommended).
trans-unit.target: NTFS-komprimering är inbyggt, snabbt och tillförlitligt. Komprimerar vanligtvis minneskort (högst rekommenderat).

Terminology warning for European languages: the "Twist" action on a neGcon has translations hidden in PS1 and PS2 manuals. However, the few cases I was able to find had inconsistency issues. If someone has enough Namco/Sony PS1/PS2 manuals from games with neGcon support, please take a look at those to figure out if there's a consisten terminology for French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch or Greek (or any other missing language).

Terminology warning for European languages: the "Twist" action on a neGcon has translations hidden in PS1 and PS2 manuals. However, the few cases I was able to find had inconsistency issues. If someone has enough Namco/Sony PS1/PS2 manuals from games with neGcon support, please take a look at those to figure out if there's a consisten terminology for French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch or Greek (or any other missing language).

trans-unit.resname: QtHost['RA: Logged in as %1 (%2 pts, softcore: %3 pts). %4 unread messages.']
trans-unit.source: RA: Logged in as %1 (%2 pts, softcore: %3 pts). %4 unread messages.
trans-unit.target: RA: Inloggad som %1 (%2 poäng, softcore: %3 poäng). %4 olästa meddelanden.
trans-unit.note: "Softcore" is a word from the RetroAchievements project. It should be the opposite of "hardcore", as in: - Hardcore mode is a mode that only enables achievements if no emulation assistances are used, like savestates, fast forward and others. - "Softcore" mode would be the mode that tracks achievements, but allowing such emulation niceties. Softcore achievements do not enter into RetroAchivement's leaderboards, though.

trans-unit.resname:
SaveState['This save state is outdated and is no longer compatible with the current version of PCSX2.
If you have any unsaved progress on this save state, you can download the compatible version (PCSX2 {}) from pcsx2.net, load the save state, and save your progress to the memory card.']
trans-unit.source:
This save state is outdated and is no longer compatible with the current version of PCSX2.
If you have any unsaved progress on this save state, you can download the compatible version (PCSX2 {}) from pcsx2.net, load the save state, and save your progress to the memory card.
trans-unit.target:
Detta sparade tillstånd är föråldrat och inte längre kompatibelt med den aktuella versionen av PCSX2.
Om du har någon spel som inte sparats på detta sparade tillstånd så kan du hämta den kompatibela versionen (PCSX2 {}) från pcsx2.net. Läs sedan in det sparade tillståndet och spara ditt spel till minneskortet.
